2_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT most_RBS recent_JJ work_NN on_IN ganja_NN (_( Dr._NNP Prain_NNP 's_POS report_NN of_IN 21st_CD June_NNP 1893_CD )_) it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN ``_`` in_IN India_NNP three_CD narcotic_JJ articles_NNS are_VBP obtained_VBN naturally_RB from_IN hemp_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP ,_, siddhi_JJ or_CC bhang_NN ,_, charas_NNS ,_, and_CC ganja_NN ._. ''_''
They_PRP are_VBP thus_RB defined_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Prain_NNP :_: ``_`` Siddhi_NNP ,_, bhang_NN ,_, subji_NN or_CC patti_NNS are_VBP different_JJ names_NNS applied_VBN to_TO the_DT dry_JJ leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, whether_IN male_NN or_CC female_NN and_CC whether_IN cultivated_VBN or_CC uncultivated_VBN ._.
``_`` Charas_NNP is_VBZ the_DT name_NN applied_VBD to_TO the_DT resinous_JJ matter_NN which_WDT forms_VBZ the_DT active_JJ principle_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN when_WRB collected_VBN separately_RB ._.
``_`` Ganja_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT dried_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS of_IN cultivated_JJ female_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS which_WDT have_VBP become_VBN coated_VBN with_IN resin_NN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN having_VBG been_VBN unable_JJ to_TO set_VB seeds_NNS freely_RB ._.
The_DT formation_NN of_IN seeds_NNS is_VBZ prevented_VBN by_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT male_NN plants_NNS ._.
``_`` Three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP sold_VBN ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ usually_RB manufactured_VBN by_IN being_VBG trodden_JJ under_IN foot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_JJ assume_NN a_DT flattened_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ 'Flat_JJ ganja_NN ._. '_''
The_DT other_JJ sort_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ not_RB trodden_JJ ,_, but_CC rolled_VBD under_IN foot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_NNS are_VBP less_RBR closely_RB adherent_JJ ,_, and_CC assume_VB a_DT rounded_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ 'Round_JJ ganja_NN ._. '_''
The_DT flower-tops_NNS of_IN ganja_NN detached_VBN from_IN the_DT twigs_NNS ,_, whether_IN of_IN flat_JJ or_CC of_IN round_NN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT detachment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN accidental_JJ or_CC deliberate_NN ,_, form_NN 'chur_NNP '_POS or_CC 'Broken_VBN ganja_NN ._. '_'' ''_''
May_NNP these_DT definitions_NNS be_VB accepted_VBN for_IN your_PRP$ pro-_JJ vince_NN ?_.
By_IN what_WP name_NN is_VBZ each_DT of_IN these_DT products_NNS locally_RB known_VBN ?_.

Ganja_NNP ,_, bhang_NN or_CC siddhi_NN ,_, and_CC charas_NNS are_VBP nar-_JJ cotic_JJ products_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, Cannabis_NNP sativa.Ganja_NN consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT resin-coated_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS of_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ unfertilized_JJ female_NN plant_NN ;_: bhang_CC or_CC siddhi_NN is_VBZ the_DT name_NN applied_VBD to_TO the_DT dried_VBN or_CC mature_JJ leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ usually_RB gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT plant_NN in_IN a_DT wild_JJ state_NN ;_: charas_NNS is_VBZ the_DT resin_NN which_WDT is_VBZ collected_VBN from_IN the_DT unseeded_JJ plant_NN while_IN it_PRP is_VBZ growing_VBG ._.

This_DT exudation_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS ._.

Ganja_NNP and_CC charas_NNS are_VBP usually_RB smoked_VBN ._.

In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN both_CC the_DT tendency_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN is_VBZ to_TO develop_VB into_IN the_DT excessive_JJ ._.
There_EX seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB no_DT custom_NN ,_, social_JJ or_CC religious_JJ ,_, regarding_VBG the_DT consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, but_CC bhang_NN is_VBZ required_VBN to_TO be_VB used_VBN by_IN both_DT males_NNS and_CC females_NNS on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Durga_NNP Puja_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT images_NNS have_VBP been_VBN thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.

The_DT use_NN of_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ not_RB considered_VBN equally_RB reprehensi-_JJ ble_NN ._.

A_DT shopkeeper_JJ keeps_VBZ a_DT small_JJ branch_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN a_DT pot_NN or_CC lota_NN as_IN a_DT sign_NN of_IN his_PRP$ trade_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB observed_VBN to_TO salute_VB it_PRP reverentially_RB on_IN opening_VBG his_PRP$ shop_NN in_IN the_DT morn-_JJ ing_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT special_JJ sanctity_NN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT plant_NN ,_, the_DT practice_NN of_IN making_VBG a_DT salaam_NN on_IN opening_VBG their_PRP$ stores_NNS being_VBG common_JJ to_TO other_JJ shop-_JJ keepers_NNS ._.

Not_RB so_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN bhang_NN ._.

The_DT prohibi-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN would_MD cause_VB very_RB serious_JJ discontent_NN among_IN the_DT consumers_NNS ,_, especially_RB among_IN those_DT every-day_JJ toilers_NNS who_WP use_VBP it_PRP as_IN a_DT food-accessory_JJ while_IN undergoing_VBG fatigue_NN ,_, or_CC as_IN a_DT refreshing_VBG pick-me-up_NN when_WRB the_DT day_NN 's_POS work_NN is_VBZ done_VBN ._.

The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, universally_RB grown_VBN in_IN the_DT Gurjat_NNP Mahals_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP only_RB made_VBN one_CD tour_NN in_IN these_DT tracts_NNS ,_, which_WDT lasted_VBD three_CD months_NNS ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT plant_NN growing_VBG near_IN houses_NNS ,_, but_CC can_MD not_RB say_VB whether_IN it_PRP was_VBD cultivated_VBN or_CC had_VBD sprung_VBN up_IN of_IN itself_PRP ._.

I_PRP have_VBP never_RB heard_VBN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG used_VBN for_IN cattle_NNS ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB grown_VBN in_IN fields_NNS ,_, but_CC five_CD or_CC six_CD plants_NNS may_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN almost_RB every_DT village_NN ._.
This_DT amount_NN of_IN growth_NN is_VBZ more_JJR than_IN would_MD be_VB required_VBN for_IN the_DT alleged_JJ medicinal_NN use_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP doubt_VBP if_IN all_PDT the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ used_VBN medicinally_RB ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ collected_VBN in_IN centres_NNS and_CC sold_VBN into_IN British_JJ territory_NN ,_, most_RBS pro-_JJ bably_NN by_IN the_DT Rajas_NNP or_CC their_PRP$ underlings_NNS ,_, certainly_RB not_RB without_IN the_DT Rajas_NNP '_POS consent_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB it_PRP is_VBZ much_RB used_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
About_IN three_CD years_NNS ago_IN we_PRP tried_VBD to_TO get_VB the_DT Rajas_NNP to_TO agree_VB to_TO allow_VB the_DT drug_NN to_TO be_VB exported_VBN under_IN regular_JJ supervision_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT set_NN of_IN rules_NNS was_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.

E._NNP 115_CD Regarding_VBG the_DT orders_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP in_IN September_NNP 1889_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD no_DT doubt_NN a_DT mistake_NN in_IN fact_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT Gurjat_NNP ganja_NN was_VBD used_VBN entirely_RB or_CC mainly_RB as_IN a_DT drink_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX was_VBD any_DT mistake_NN in_IN the_DT policy_NN of_IN that_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, because_IN ,_, though_IN the_DT Superintend-_JJ ent_NN reported_VBD that_IN the_DT prohibition_NN had_VBD been_VBN en-_RB forced_VBN in_IN eleven_NN of_IN the_DT States_NNPS ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN the_DT enforcement_NN was_VBD more_JJR than_IN nominal_JJ ._.
Even_RB if_IN a_DT Raja_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO prohibit_VB ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB he_PRP would_MD carry_VB out_RP the_DT arrangement_NN ._.

I_PRP believe_VBP also_RB that_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS Government_NNP exercises_VBZ stricter_JJR supervision_NN and_CC more_JJR severe_JJ control_NN over_IN the_DT proceedings_NNS of_IN the_DT Rajas_NNP than_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP allows_VBZ the_DT Superintendent_NN to_TO do_VB ._.
I_PRP understand_VBP that_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNP has_VBZ authority_NN to_TO send_VB for_IN a_DT Raja_NNP and_CC reprimand_NN and_CC warn_VB him_PRP regarding_VBG the_DT mis-_JJ government_NN of_IN his_PRP$ State_NNP ;_: whereas_NNS on_IN our_PRP$ side_NN this_DT is_VBZ not_RB allowed_VBN ,_, except_IN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN open_JJ revolt_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT Government_NNP is_VBZ to_TO secure_VB the_DT Rajas_NNP against_IN revolt_NN as_IN the_DT consequence_NN of_IN misgovernment_NN ,_, there_EX ought_MD to_TO be_VB greater_JJR powers_NNS of_IN supervision_NN and_CC control_NN than_IN there_EX are_VBP at_IN present_JJ ._.
With_IN these_DT greater_JJR powers_NNS in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP the_DT Rajas_NNP would_MD be_VB more_JJR amen-_JJ able_JJ to_TO advice_VB ._.
And_CC any_DT advice_NN which_WDT the_DT Chiefs_NNP affected_VBD to_TO accept_VB ,_, and_CC any_DT orders_NNS issued_VBN in_IN accord-_JJ ance_NN therewith_NN ,_, would_MD also_RB be_VB much_RB more_RBR easily_RB given_VBN effect_NN to_TO and_CC carried_VBN out_RP if_IN there_EX were_VBD a_DT political_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN to_TO visit_VB the_DT States_NNPS and_CC be_VB in_IN constant_JJ touch_NN with_IN them_PRP as_IN the_DT Superin-_NNP tendent_NN ,_, Tributary_NNP Mahals_NNP ,_, can_MD not_RB possibly_RB be_VB ._.
In_IN excise_NN matters_NNS the_DT Rajas_NNP would_MD become_VB more_RBR amenable_JJ if_IN such_JJ an_DT arrangement_NN were_VBD made_VBN ._.
And_CC as_IN regards_NNS ganja_NNS ,_, all_DT that_WDT would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ would_MD be_VB to_TO get_VB the_DT Rajas_NNP to_TO order_NN all_PDT the_DT ganja_NN intended_VBN for_IN export_NN to_TO British_JJ territory_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN together_RB into_IN a_DT central_JJ depôt_NN and_CC to_TO be_VB sent_VBN only_RB under_IN pass_NN ._.
Such_JJ ganja_NNS would_MD be_VB sub-_JJ jected_VBN to_TO an_DT adequate_JJ duty_NN on_IN entering_VBG British_JJ territory_NN ._.
I_PRP should_MD not_RB interfere_VB with_IN internal_JJ consumption_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT Raja_NNP would_MD then_RB be_VB responsible_JJ that_IN ganja_NN was_VBD not_RB exported_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ territory_NN without_IN pass_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, he_PRP would_MD issue_VB orders_NNS against_IN any_DT export_NN except_IN through_IN the_DT gola_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP would_MD punish_VB any_DT attempt_NN to_TO evade_VB such_JJ order_NN ._.
A_DT smuggler_NN would_MD render_VB him-_JJ self_NN liable_JJ to_TO punishment_VB by_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ Raja_NNP and_CC the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Raja_NNP would_MD be_VB secured_VBN ._.
If_IN this_DT were_VBD effectually_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT Rajas_NNP would_MD agree_VB to_TO prohibit_VB cultivation_NN and_CC accept_VB our_PRP$ ganja_NN ,_, receiving_VBG the_DT duty_NN them-_JJ selves_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, that_WDT would_MD be_VB a_DT better_JJR and_CC simpler_JJR solution_NN of_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT decision_NN of_IN the_DT High_NNP Court_NNP and_CC the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP declaring_VBG the_DT Gurjat_NNP States_NNPS to_TO be_VB foreign_JJ territory_NN has_VBZ been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN the_DT repeal_NN of_IN the_DT Regulations_NNS which_WDT were_VBD previ-_JJ ously_RB in_IN force_NN ._.

I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB whether_IN it_PRP has_VBZ actually_RB been_VBN altered_VBN :_: that_WDT will_MD depend_VB on_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT sanads_NNS which_WDT are_VBP under_IN consideration_NN ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP A._NNP W._NNP B_NNP ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP H._NNP LUTTMAN-JOHNSON_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP of_IN Dacca_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
I_PRP came_VBD out_RP in_IN December_NNP 1867_CD ,_, and_CC have_VBP served_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, Behar_NNP and_CC Assam_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD only_RB a_DT year_NN in_IN Behar_NNP ,_, and_CC have_VBP chiefly_VBN experience_NN of_IN Assam_NNP and_CC Bengal_NNP ._.
Sylhet_NNP and_CC Cachar_NNP are_VBP much_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ,_, though_IN part_NN of_IN Assam_NNP ._.
The_DT Brahmaputra_NNP Valley_NNP practically_RB constitutes_VBZ Assam_NNP as_IN contrasted_VBN with_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP when_WRB he_PRP managed_VBD excise_NN direct_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP also_RB been_VBN Com-_NNP missioner_NN of_IN the_DT Brahmaputra_NNP Valley_NNP ;_: so_RB I_PRP have_VBP considerable_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT Assam_NNP side_NN of_IN the_DT question_NN ._.
The_DT problem_NN may_MD be_VB viewed_VBN for_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP and_CC Sylhet_NNP and_CC Cachar_NNP together_RB on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN wild_NN in_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, Cachar_NNP ,_, and_CC Mymensingh_NNP ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP and_CC the_DT Khasia_NNP hills_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PRP know_VBP it_PRP grows_VBZ wild_JJ in_IN the_DT Naga_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC Bhutan_NNP ,_, because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ smuggled_VBN down_RB ._.
I_PRP should_MD say_VB that_IN the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN is_VBZ from_IN seed_NN accidentally_RB sown_VBN ._.
I_PRP judge_VBP this_DT from_IN its_PRP$ situation_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN it_PRP near_IN villages_NNS in_IN bunches_NNS and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, but_CC not_RB actually_RB in_IN the_DT jungles_NNS of_IN Cachar_NNP or_CC Assam_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN it_PRP rather_RB in_IN connection_NN with_IN habita-_JJ tions_NNS than_IN in_IN jungles_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PRP judge_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN it_PRP grows_VBZ from_IN seed_NN of_IN imported_VBN ganja_NN ._.
I_PRP find_VBP that_IN this_DT view_NN is_VBZ stated_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ Excise_NNP Report_NNP for_IN Assam_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP noticed_VBN it_PRP most_RBS in_IN the_DT waste_NN spaces_NNS ,_, especially_RB near_IN villages_NNS on_IN the_DT Grand_NNP Trunk_NNP Road_NNP through_IN Assam_NNP in_IN the_DT Nowgong_NNP district_NN ,_, in_IN tobacco_NN fields_NNS in_IN a_DT village_NN near_IN Korabandar_NNP Ghat_NNP in_IN the_DT Kamrup_NNP district_NN ,_, and_CC last_JJ cold_NN weather_NN ,_, when_WRB out_RP shooting_VBG in_IN Mymensingh_NNP ,_, I_PRP found_VBD twenty_RB or_CC thirty_JJ acres_NNS of_IN it_PRP (_( more_RBR or_CC less_RBR thick_JJ )_) in_IN Thana_NNP Durgapur_NNP ._.
These_DT instances_NNS occur_VBP to_TO me_PRP at_IN present_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN many_JJ other_JJ instances_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS I_PRP did_VBD not_RB think_VB it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN intentionally_RB sown_VBN ._.
I_PRP asked_VBD about_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT people_NNS said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD jungly_RB ,_, grown_VBN up_IN of_IN itself_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB use_VB it_PRP for_IN anything_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP known_VBN of_IN illicit_JJ cultivation_NN in_IN Assam_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD a_DT good_JJ many_JJ cases_NNS discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT Golaghat_NNP sub-division_NN and_CC also_RB in_IN the_DT Dibrugarh_NNP country_NN ._.

I_PRP fancy_VBP the_DT reason_NN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB remember_VB many_JJ cases_NNS in_IN Sylhet_NNP and_CC Cachar_NNP is_VBZ because_IN we_PRP did_VBD not_RB make_VB any_DT great_JJ effort_NN to_TO stop_VB it_PRP or_CC pay_VB much_JJ attention_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ since_IN I_PRP left_VBD that_IN greater_JJR efforts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO stop_VB unlicensed_JJ cultivation_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ both_DT in_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC Assam_NNP ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN effective_JJ without_IN much_JJ harass-_JJ ing_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
But_CC you_PRP have_VBP only_RB to_TO stir_VB up_RP the_DT police_NN with_IN a_DT circular_JJ and_CC hope_NN of_IN reward_NN to_TO give_VB trouble_NN ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN which_WDT exists_VBZ is_VBZ trifling_VBG ;_: but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, a_DT little_JJ ganja_NN goes_VBZ a_DT long_JJ way_NN ._.
Cases_NNS of_IN illicit_JJ growth_NN are_VBP not_RB very_RB common_JJ ;_: the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT do_VBP occur_RB often_RB turn_VBP out_RP not_RB to_TO be_VB cases_NNS of_IN cultivation_NN ,_, but_CC merely_RB accidental_JJ growth_NN ._.

The_DT ganja_NN from_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN would_MD be_VB very_RB inferior_JJ ._.

We_PRP experimented_VBD with_IN it_PRP ;_: it_PRP was_VBD not_RB anything_NN like_IN excise_NN ganja_NN ,_, but_CC poor_JJ stuff_NN ._.
My_PRP$ general_JJ conclusion_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB feasible17_JJ I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB whether_IN ganja_NN or_CC alcohol_NN is_VBZ more_RBR connected_JJ with_IN crime_NN ._.
But_CC my_PRP$ experience_NN leads_VBZ me_PRP to_TO say_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP districts_NNS it_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN that_IN both_DT these_DT intoxicants_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB associated_VBN with_IN crime_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN tea_NN gardens_NNS ._.

7_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP P._NNP NOLAN_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP ,_, Rajshahi_NNP Division_NNP ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN smoking_VBG ganja_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN with_IN disfavour_NN by_IN the_DT upper_JJ classes_NNS of_IN this_DT division_NN ,_, while_IN drinking_VBG bhang_NN on_IN certain_JJ occasions_NNS is_VBZ among_IN them_PRP an_DT honoured_JJ custom_NN ._.
The_DT distinction_NN thus_RB made_VBD does_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, rest_NN on_IN an_DT impartial_JJ judgment_NN formed_VBN after_IN a_DT full_JJ investigation_NN of_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD practices_NNS ._.
The_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT ganja_NN may_MD be_VB injurious_JJ is_VBZ not_RB at_IN present_JJ known_VBN ,_, and_CC we_PRP must_MD trust_VB to_TO the_DT present_JJ inquiry_NN to_TO elicit_VB the_DT real_JJ facts_NNS ._.
Ganja_NNP smoking_NN is_VBZ despised_VBN by_IN the_DT well-to-do_NN ,_, because_IN its_PRP$ consumption_NN is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ who_WP can_MD afford_VB no_DT other_JJ indulgence_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN drink-_JJ ing_VBG gin_NN in_IN a_DT public_JJ house_NN is_VBZ looked_VBN down_RB on_IN by_IN gentlemen_NNS who_WP take_VBP champagne_NN and_CC liquors_NNS in_IN clubs_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT sentiment_NN is_VBZ stronger_JJR here_RB ,_, for_IN in_IN this_DT land_NN of_IN caste_NN ,_, more_JJR than_IN any_DT other_JJ ,_, the_DT well-_JJ to-do_JJ feel_NN a_DT repulsion_NN for_IN any_DT food_NN or_CC stimulant_NN used_VBN exclusively_RB by_IN those_DT beneath_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT social_JJ scale_NN ._.
Opium_NN is_VBZ certainly_RB more_RBR injurious_JJ than_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC yet_RB its_PRP$ use_NN excites_VBZ no_DT such_JJ aversion_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN by_IN the_DT rich_JJ ._.
Apart_RB from_IN this_DT class_NN prejudice_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ among_IN the_DT working_JJ classes_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT more_RBR antipathy_JJ to_TO ganja_VB ,_, than_IN there_EX is_VBZ ,_, in_IN England_NNP ,_, to_TO strong_JJ tobacco_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT form_NN of_IN smoking_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD probably_RB be_VB possible_JJ to_TO put_VB a_DT stop_NN to_TO the_DT supply_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT crop_NN can_MD not_RB easily_RB be_VB grown_VBN without_IN observation_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN bhang_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB prevented_VBN ,_, because_IN the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ wild_WRB everywhere_RB ._.
There_EX are_VBP many_JJ forms_NNS of_IN self-_JJ indulgence_NN open_JJ to_TO abuse_VB ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT question_NN for_IN investigation_NN whether_IN men_NNS inclined_VBN to_TO intemper-_JJ ance_NN ,_, when_WRB stopped_VBN from_IN using_VBG a_DT particular_JJ drug_NN ,_, will_MD not_RB take_VB to_TO some_DT other_JJ evil_JJ practice_NN ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Question_NN 1.18_CD I_PRP have_VBP not_RB studied_VBN the_DT question_NN of_IN production_NN or_CC cultivation_NN in_IN other_JJ provinces_NNS ._.

But_CC the_DT experience_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP shows_VBZ this_DT to_TO be_VB feasible_JJ ._.

That_DT is_VBZ the_DT question_NN now_RB under_IN trial_NN before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP observed_VBN a_DT proposal_NN in_IN the_DT replies_NNS to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP 's_POS questions_NNS by_IN the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP tract_NN ,_, that_WDT Government_NNP should_MD pur-_VB chase_VB the_DT ganja_NN from_IN the_DT cultivator_NN ,_, store_NN it_PRP ,_, and_CC distribute_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT distant_JJ districts_NNS where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ con-_JJ sumed_NN ._.
If_IN this_DT proposal_NN is_VBZ under_IN the_DT serious_JJ con-_JJ sideration_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, I_PRP desire_VBP to_TO record_VB an_DT opinion_NN against_IN it_PRP ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN Government_NNP to_TO purchase_VB from_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS as_IN private_JJ dealers_NNS do_VBP ._.
The_DT experience_NN gained_VBN by_IN the_DT State_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO opium_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN planters_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO indigo_VB shows_NNS that_IN when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ only_RB one_CD pur-_JJ chaser_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, he_PRP must_MD make_VB his_PRP$ arrangements_NNS before_IN the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ grown_VBN on_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN contract_NN and_CC advances_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB it_PRP desirable_JJ to_TO undertake_VB such_JJ a_DT business_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO a_DT commod-_JJ ity_NN for_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ so_RB little_JJ demand_NN ,_, merely_RB for_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN intercepting_VBG the_DT moderate_JJ profits_NNS now_RB made_VBN by_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ dealers_NNS ._.
The_DT system_NN by_IN which_WDT the_DT right_NN of_IN wholesale_JJ vend_NN is_VBZ put_VBN up_RP to_TO auction_NN with_IN the_DT condition_NN that_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ dealer_NN shall_MD sell_VB to_TO the_DT retail_JJ dealer_NN at_IN a_DT fixed_JJ price_NN is_VBZ new_JJ to_TO me_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP not_RB pre-_JJ pared_VBD to_TO give_VB an_DT opinion_NN on_IN it_PRP at_IN such_JJ short_JJ notice_NN ._.
Appendix_NNP to_TO MR._NNP NOLAN_NNP 'S_POS evidence_NN ._.
The_DT consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ much_RB smaller_JJR than_IN is_VBZ popularly_RB supposed_VBN ._.
All_DT Bengal_NNP ,_, Assam_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT North-West_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN 80,000,000_CD ,_, is_VBZ supplied_VBN from_IN an_DT area_NN of_IN 800_CD acres_NNS ,_, the_DT standard_JJ size_NN of_IN a_DT single_JJ tea_NN garden_NN ._.
The_DT gross_JJ amount_NN grown_VBN averages_NNS 8,000_CD maunds_NNS a_DT year_NN ;_: but_CC much_RB of_IN this_DT is_VBZ wasted_VBN before_IN issue_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT duty_NN was_VBD paid_VBN last_JJ year_NN on_IN 5,451_CD maunds_NNS only_RB ._.

10._CD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
15_CD a_DT maund_NN on_IN a_DT average_NN throughout_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
His_PRP$ expenses_NNS are_VBP in_IN transport_NN ,_, buildings_NNS and_CC estab-_JJ lishments_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT risk_NN of_IN expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT duty_NN on_IN waste_NN above_IN the_DT allowed_JJ percentage_NN is_VBZ great_JJ ._.
As_IN to_TO the_DT retail_JJ vendor_NN ,_, of_IN course_NN he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB know_VB what_WP price_NN he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO pay_VB for_IN the_DT stuff_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT speculation_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP see_VBP no_DT reason_NN why_WRB Government_NNP should_MD interfere_VB ._.
He_PRP knows_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ business_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO prevent_VB a_DT retail_JJ vendor_NN going_VBG to_TO Naogaon_NNP to_TO buy_VB ganja_NN if_IN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT wholesale_JJ gola_NN in_IN the_DT importing_NN district_NN ._.
He_PRP must_MD have_VB this_DT ,_, or_CC where_WRB can_MD he_PRP take_VB the_DT ganja_NN ?_.
A_DT retail_JJ vendor_NN ,_, to_TO deal_VB direct_JJ with_IN the_DT cultivator_NN ,_, must_MD become_VB also_RB a_DT wholesale_JJ vendor_NN ._.
And_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT wholesale_JJ dealer_NN has_VBZ the_DT monopoly_NN of_IN the_DT retail_JJ trade_NN as_RB well_RB ,_, i.e._FW ,_, where_WRB the_DT whole_JJ ganja_NN trade_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT syn-_JJ dicate_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP my_PRP$ attention_NN drawn_NN to_TO Rule_NNP 27_CD of_IN Sec-_NNP tion_NN XX_NNP of_IN the_DT Manual_NNP ._.
But_CC it_PRP contemplates_VBZ a_DT warehouse_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN this_DT means_VBZ a_DT wholesale_JJ storehouse_NN in_IN the_DT importing_NN district_NN ._.
Therefore_RB the_DT retail_JJ vendor_NN must_MD be_VB a_DT wholesale_JJ vendor_NN before_IN he_PRP can_MD purchase_VB direct_JJ ._.
The_DT retail_JJ dealer_NN can_MD go_VB to_TO any_DT wholesale_JJ dealer_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT head-quarters_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ district_NN there_EX are_VBP three_CD wholesale_JJ dealers_NNS ._.
There_EX would_MD thus_RB be_VB competition_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, liable_JJ to_TO combination_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT retail_JJ vendor_NN can_MD go_VB to_TO the_DT wholesale_JJ dealer_NN of_IN any_DT district_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ contemplated_VBN by_IN Rule_NNP 60_CD of_IN Section_NNP XX_NNP of_IN the_DT Manual_NNP ._.
The_DT income_NN from_IN retail_JJ licenses_NNS has_VBZ increased_VBN steadily_RB ._.
This_DT indicates_VBZ that_IN the_DT retail_JJ licensee_NN makes_VBZ a_DT profit_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN they_PRP are_VBP at_IN the_DT mercy_NN of_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ dealers_NNS ,_, because_IN combination_NN would_MD be_VB difficult_JJ among_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ vendors_NNS of_IN a_DT district_NN ._.
And_CC in_IN any_DT case_NN I_PRP see_VBP no_DT reason_NN for_IN interference_NN ._.
The_DT rise_NN in_IN retail_JJ license_NN fees_NNS is_VBZ due_JJ ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, really_RB in_IN large_JJ measure_NN to_TO the_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT price_NN charged_VBN for_IN the_DT drug_NN to_TO consumers_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT retail_JJ vendors_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT dark_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT price_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN when_WRB they_PRP bid_VBP ;_: and_CC the_DT wholesale_JJ vendors_NNS have_VBP better_JJR opportunities_NNS of_IN knowing_VBG what_WP the_DT price_NN will_MD be_VB than_IN the_DT retail_JJ vendors_NNS can_MD have_VB ._.
For_IN it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT wholesale_JJ vendors_NNS who_WP go_VBP to_TO the_DT ganja-producing_JJ tracts_NNS and_CC do_VBP business_NN there_RB ._.
The_DT present_JJ system_NN affords_VBZ no_DT criterion_NN of_IN the_DT profits_NNS received_VBN by_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ vendor_NN ,_, except_IN by_IN particular_JJ enquiry_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN as_IN to_TO prices_NNS and_CC expenses_NNS ._.
At_IN present_JJ wholesale_JJ goladars_NNS are_VBP appointed_VBN on_IN application_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB any_DT one_CD would_MD be_VB refused_VBN who_WP made_VBD satisfactory_JJ arrange-_JJ ments_NNS ._.
I_PRP know_VBP in_IN my_PRP$ district_NN there_EX are_VBP eight_CD ;_: and_CC I_PRP should_MD say_VB that_DT was_VBD a_DT very_RB small_JJ number_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN other_JJ districts_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT work_NN could_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN one_CD man_NN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD a_DT monopoly_NN ._.
Explanatory_JJ statement_NN submitted_VBN by_IN MR._NNP PRICE_NNP ._.
I_PRP said_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ evidence_NN that_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS would_MD view_VB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN public_JJ golas_NNS into_IN the_DT ganja_JJ tract_NN with_IN disfavour_NN ;_: they_PRP would_MD want_VB to_TO inspect_VB and_CC exhibit_VB their_PRP$ stocks_NNS three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS a_DT week_NN ._.
They_PRP would_MD want_VB this_DT for_IN some_DT time_NN at_IN first_JJ ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ desire_NN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN their_PRP$ stocks_NNS ._.
Intending_VBG purchasers_NNS would_MD not_RB buy_VB without_IN inspection_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB possible_JJ that_IN on_IN many_JJ days_NNS the_DT ganja_NN would_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO be_VB exhibited_VBN several_JJ times_NNS a_DT day_NN to_TO intending_VBG purchasers_NNS ._.
In_IN any_DT case_NN I_PRP am_VBP quite_RB sure_JJ that_IN a_DT cultivator_NN would_MD wish_VB to_TO view_VB his_PRP$ stock_NN very_RB much_RB oftener_JJR than_IN twice_RB or_CC thrice_VB a_DT week_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ stored_VBN in_IN a_DT public_JJ gola_NN ._.
I_PRP omitted_VBD to_TO mention_VB this_DT cause_NN of_IN constant_JJ inspection_NN when_WRB I_PRP was_VBD being_VBG examined_VBN ._.
10_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP F._NNP H._NNP BARROW_NNP ,_, Magistrate_NNP and_CC Collector_NNP of_IN Bankura_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT answers_NNS are_VBP prepared_JJ chiefly_NN by_IN Babu_NNP Bhuban_NNP Mohan_NNP Raha_NNP ,_, a_DT retired_JJ Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, who_WP long_RB held_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Department_NNP in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT definitions_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, siddhi_NN or_CC bhang_NN and_CC charas_VB given_VBN in_IN the_DT question_NN apply_NN to_TO this_DT district_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT district_NN only_RB two_CD kinds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, round_NN and_CC chur_NN ,_, are_VBP consumed_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB allowed_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ;_: sometimes_VBZ it_PRP grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB if_IN seeds_NNS fall_VBP in_IN moist_JJ places_NNS ;_: but_CC such_JJ instances_NNS are_VBP very_RB rare_JJ ._.
It_PRP grows_VBZ wild_JJ and_CC abundantly_RB in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Dacca_NNP and_CC Faridpur_NNP ,_, and_CC similar_JJ districts_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT soil_NN is_VBZ damp_JJ ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT wild_NN plant_NN which_WDT grows_VBZ here_RB is_VBZ called_VBN siddhi_NN ._.
Only_RB one_CD kind_NN of_IN wild_JJ plant_NN grows_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
A_DT damp_JJ climate_NN and_CC moist_NN soil_NN are_VBP favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Ordinarily_RB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN is_VBZ dense_JJ ._.
This_DT remark_NN applies_VBZ to_TO the_DT districts_NNS where_WRB it_PRP grows_VBZ ._.
Not_RB of_IN course_NN to_TO this_DT ,_, where_WRB it_PRP grows_VBZ only_RB sporadically_RB ._.
7_CD to_TO 13_CD ._.
Do_MD not_RB apply_VB to_TO this_DT district_NN ._.
The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ not_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN this_DT 29_CD district_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS it_PRP grows_VBZ wild_JJ and_CC the_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP generally_RB used_VBN as_IN bhang_NN ._.
Wild_JJ hemp_NN is_VBZ not_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN for_IN the_DT produc-_JJ tion_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB penal_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.
14_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP and_CC charas_NNS are_VBP not_RB prepared_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ suspected_VBN that_IN in_IN a_DT very_RB few_JJ in-_JJ stances_NNS leaves_NNS of_IN wild_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN are_VBP used_VBN as_IN bhang_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT consumption_NN of_IN the_DT so_RB prepared_JJ bhang_NN is_VBZ very_RB inconsiderable_JJ ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT leaves_NNS of_IN wild_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS are_VBP con-_JJ sumed_NNS after_IN being_VBG ground_NN into_IN a_DT paste_NN and_CC then_RB dissolved_VBD in_IN water_NN and_CC drunk_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
Here_RB bhang_NN is_VBZ not_RB generally_RB prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP can_MD be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN wherever_WRB grown_NN ._.
On_IN enquiry_NN made_VBD it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN charas_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN ,_, but_CC ganja_NN of_IN very_RB inferior_JJ quality_NN may_MD sometimes_RB be_VB prepared_JJ ._.
17_CD ._.
Not_RB applicable_JJ to_TO this_DT district_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP ,_, charas_NN and_CC bhang_NN do_VBP deteriorate_VB by_IN keeping_VBG ._.
They_PRP quite_RB lose_VBP their_PRP$ effect_NN after_IN two_CD years_NNS ;_: with_IN ordinary_JJ care_NN they_PRP can_MD be_VB kept_VBN good_JJ for_IN one_CD year_NN ._.
By_IN long_RB keeping_VBG they_PRP lose_VBP the_DT resinous_JJ matter_NN and_CC consequently_RB their_PRP$ narcotic_JJ power_NN ;_: deterioration_NN after_IN two_CD years_NNS can-_JJ not_RB be_VB prevented_VBN by_IN any_DT special_JJ measure_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN this_DT district_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, ganja_NN is_VBZ used_VBN only_RB for_IN smoking_NN ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ very_RB rarely_RB used_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB by_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP purchased_VBN it_PRP elsewhere_RB within_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ limits_NNS ._.
20_CD ._.
The_DT ganja_NN smokers_NNS of_IN this_DT district_NN may_MD be_VB classified_VBN as_IN follows:30_JJ consort_NN ,_, Kali_NNP or_CC Durga_NNP ,_, a_DT very_RB large_JJ quantity_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ consumed_VBN ._.
These_DT ceremonies_NNS are_VBP Siva-_NNP chaturdasi_NN ,_, Chait-sankranti_NNP or_CC Sivagajan_NNP ._.
These_DT two_CD religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS are_VBP well_RB known_VBN and_CC require_VBP no_DT description_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT district_NN Pous-sankranti_NNP day_NN ,_, i.e._NN ,_, the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN Pous_NNP ,_, is_VBZ usually_RB spent_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN hunting_VBG excursions_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT large_JJ quantity_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ consumed_VBN on_IN such_JJ occasions_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP also_RB some_DT religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN called_VBN Ahoratra_NNP ,_, which_WDT lasts_VBZ for_IN a_DT day_NN and_CC night_NN ;_: Chabhisprahar_NNP which_WDT lasts_VBZ for_IN 3_CD days_NNS and_CC 3_CD nights_NNS ;_: and_CC Pancharatra_NNP which_WDT lasts_VBZ for_IN 5_CD days_NNS and_CC 5_CD nights_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS large_JJ crowds_NN of_IN Baisnabs_NNP assemble_JJ and_CC recite_JJ vociferously_RB the_DT names_NNS of_IN ``_`` Radha_NNP Govinda_NNP ''_'' continuously_RB with-_VBP out_RP any_DT intermission_NN whatever_WDT during_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ to_TO continue_VB ._.
They_PRP divide_VBP them-_JJ selves_NNS into_IN parties_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT energy_NN of_IN one_CD party_NN is_VBZ exhausted_VBN ,_, its_PRP$ place_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN by_IN another_DT ._.
In_IN the_DT above_JJ ceremonies_NNS ganja_VBP is_VBZ consumed_VBN rather_RB excessively_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT above_JJ ceremonies_NNS ,_, both_DT social_JJ and_CC religi-_JJ ous_JJ ,_, the_DT consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ not_RB considered_VBN essential_JJ ._.
It_PRP sometimes_RB leads_VBZ to_TO the_DT formation_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN ._.
The_DT consumption_NN of_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ very_RB considerable_JJ on_IN the_DT third_JJ or_CC Nabami_NNP day_NN of_IN the_DT Durga_NNP Puja_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT cup_NN of_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ drunk_VBN by_IN almost_RB every_DT Hindu_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN Durga_NNP Puja_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT idols_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ for_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP to_TO see_VB their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS and_CC embrace_VB them_PRP ;_: and_CC when_WRB visitors_NNS come_VBP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ usual_JJ for_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN to_TO offer_VB them_PRP a_DT cup_NN of_IN bhang_NN and_CC sweetmeats_NNS for_IN tiffin_NN ._.
33_CD ._.
The_DT consumption_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ,_, especially_RB that_IN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, is_VBZ looked_VBN down_RP on_IN ._.
A_DT ganja_NN smoker_NN is_VBZ generally_RB in_IN bad_JJ repute_NN ,_, the_DT reason_NN being_VBG pro-_JJ bably_NN that_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN it_PRP excites_VBZ low_JJ pro-_JJ pensities_NNS and_CC makes_VBZ a_DT man_NN violent_NN in_IN temper_NN ._.
The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB worshipped_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
34_CD ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN of_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS by_IN people_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS who_WP use_VBP it_PRP will_MD lead_VB to_TO much_JJ privation_NN ._.
They_PRP would_MD lose_VB appetite_VB their_PRP$ food_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB easily_RB digested_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP would_MD feel_VB a_DT sort_NN of_IN aching_VBG sensation_NN all_DT over_IN their_PRP$ body_NN ._.
35_CD ._.
It_PRP would_MD scarcely_RB be_VB feasible_JJ to_TO prohibit_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN any_DT or_CC all_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN would_MD certainly_RB lead_VB to_TO smuggling_VBG and_CC occasion_NN serious_JJ discontent_NN among_IN consumers_NNS ;_: but_CC such_JJ dis-_JJ content_NN would_MD not_RB amount_VB to_TO political_JJ danger_NN in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT prohibition_NN would_MD be_VB followed_VBN probably_RB by_IN recourse_NN to_TO alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS or_CC other_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
36_CD ._.
No_DT ;_: alcohol_NN is_VBZ dearer_JJR than_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ not_RB being_VBG substituted_VBN for_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ alcohol_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ dearness_NN ,_, finding_VBG a_DT substitute_NN in_IN ganja_NN ._.
37_CD ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ not_RB practised_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, except_IN very_RB rarely_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN it_PRP produces_VBZ a_DT very_RB mild_JJ effect_NN on_IN the_DT smokers_NNS and_CC induces_NNS sleep_VBP ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, ganja-smoking_JJ affects_VBZ the_DT mind_NN ,_, and_CC excessive_JJ indulgence_NN in_IN it_PRP makes_VBZ a_DT man_NN violent_NN in_IN temper_NN and_CC sometimes_RB insane_NN ._.
38_CD ._.
Of_IN three_CD kinds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, flat_JJ is_VBZ not_RB used_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
Round_NNP and_CC chur_NN produce_VBP the_DT same_JJ sort_NN of_IN effect_NN on_IN consumers_NNS ,_, the_DT only_JJ difference_NN being_VBG that_IN the_DT chur_NN ganja_NN is_VBZ more_RBR powerful_JJ and_CC produces_VBZ inebriation_NN more_RBR rapidly_RB ,_, the_DT reason_NN being_VBG that_IN the_DT fragments_NNS which_WDT constitute_VBP chur_NN ganja_NN contain_NN more_RBR resinous_JJ matter_NN ._.
Questions_NNS 39_CD to_TO 57_CD have_VBP been_VBN answered_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Mukerji_NNP as_IN follows:31_NN for_IN want_NN of_IN subsequent_JJ gratification_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB a_DT pity_NN to_TO deprive_VB a_DT habitual_JJ moderate_JJ consumer_NN of_IN his_PRP$ dose_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB beneficial_JJ to_TO him_PRP without_IN any_DT marked_JJ after-effect_NN ._.
45_CD ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB ._.
Nor_CC does_VBZ it_PRP impair_VB constitu-_JJ tion_NN ,_, cause_VB any_DT disease_NN ,_, impair_JJ moral_JJ sense_NN ,_, or_CC insanity_NN ,_, permanent_JJ or_CC temporary_JJ ._.
46_CD ._.
But_CC when_WRB taken_VBN in_IN excess_JJ temporarily_RB or_CC habit-_JJ ually_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD cause_VB those_DT constitutional_JJ ,_, moral_JJ or_CC intellectual_JJ derangements_NNS as_IN alluded_VBN to_TO above_VB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN principally_RB due_JJ to_TO ganja_VB smoking_NN ,_, specially_RB in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB intellect_NN was_VBD weak_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN almost_RB all_DT such_JJ cases_NNS I_PRP found_VBD the_DT in-_JJ sanity_NN to_TO be_VB of_IN a_DT temporary_JJ nature_NN ,_, which_WDT under_IN pro-_NN per_IN care_NN and_CC restraint_NN passes_NNS off_RP in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT insanes_NNS ,_, when_WRB under_IN observation_NN ,_, often_RB ask_VBZ for_IN ganja_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN its_PRP$ absence_NN ,_, for_IN tobacco_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP many_JJ cases_NNS seen_VBN who_WP owing_VBG to_TO excessive_VB habitual_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN suffer_NN from_IN chronic_JJ dysentery_NN ,_, asthma_NN or_CC bronchitis_NN ,_, while_IN its_PRP$ moderate_JJ use_NN gene-_JJ rally_NN cures_VBZ these_DT ailments_NNS ._.
47_CD and_CC 48_CD ._.
Not_RB any_DT that_IN I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ of_IN ,_, whether_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN moderate_JJ or_CC immoderate_JJ consumers_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN many_JJ children_NNS of_IN very_RB bright_JJ intellect_NN and_CC of_IN excellent_JJ parts_NNS ,_, though_IN their_PRP$ fathers_NNS were_VBD or_CC are_VBP inveterate_JJ consumers_NNS ._.
49_CD and_CC 50_CD ._.
Yes_UH ,_, but_CC the_DT immoderate_NN use_NN generally_RB causes_VBZ impotency_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP heard_VBN many_JJ prostitutes_NNS use_VBP this_DT drug_NN as_IN an_DT aphrodisiac_NN when_WRB they_PRP can_MD not_RB procure_VB alcohol_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ liable_JJ to_TO be_VB used_VBN in_IN excess_JJ occasionally_RB ._.
51_CD and_CC 52_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB heard_VBN of_IN any_DT crime_NN committed_VBN by_IN moderate_JJ consumers_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN causes_VBZ homicidal_JJ tendency_NN ,_, quarrel-_JJ someness_NN ,_, and_CC induces_VBZ consumers_NNS to_TO commit_VB many_JJ rash_NN acts_NNS ,_, but_CC seldom_RB to_TO commit_VB theft_NN ._.
But_CC siddhi_NN or_CC charas_NN ,_, even_RB when_WRB taken_VBN in_IN excess_JJ ,_, does_VBZ not_RB induce_VB consumers_NNS to_TO commit_VB any_DT rash_NN act_NN ._.
They_PRP in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS induce_VBP laziness_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT worst_JJS confine_VBP the_DT consumers_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ beds_NNS ._.
53_CD and_CC 54_CD ._.
Not_RB so_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN alcohol_NN ._.
But_CC there_EX have_VBP been_VBN instances_NNS of_IN habitual_JJ ganja_NN smokers_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, if_IN occasion_NN requires_VBZ ,_, take_VB the_DT drug_NN a_DT little_JJ in_IN excess_NN to_TO fortify_VB themselves_PRP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO taking_VBG revenge_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ adversaries_NNS ._.
55_CD ._.
Yes_UH ;_: ganja_VB alone_RB is_VBZ used_VBN with_IN the_DT admix-_JJ ture_NN of_IN dhatura_NN ,_, nux_NN vomica_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN both_DT ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN committing_VBG road-poisoning_NN ,_, and_CC in-_JJ stances_NNS are_VBP not_RB wanting_VBG to_TO show_VB that_IN complete_JJ stupefaction_NN has_VBZ been_VBN induced_VBN or_CC even_RB death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
56_CD ._.
Dhatura_NNP is_VBZ admixtured_VBN to_TO siddhi_VB or_CC ganja_VB to_TO increase_VB their_PRP$ intoxicating_NN or_CC even_RB stupefying_VBG power_NN ._.

58_CD ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN improvement_NN in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN restriction_NN ._.

Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Question_NN 1.43_CD The_DT illicit_JJ consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN would_MD pro-_VB bably_RB be_VB supplied_VBN by_IN illicit_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN and_CC also_RB by_IN importation_NN probably_RB from_IN Nepal_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB enquired_VBN into_IN the_DT difficulties_NNS that_WDT lie_VBP in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN such_JJ cultivation_NN and_CC importation_NN ._.
I_PRP also_RB think_VBP that_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN necessity_NN for_IN the_DT drug_NN among_IN the_DT labouring_NN and_CC agricultural_JJ classes_NNS would_MD justify_VB the_DT supply_NN of_IN the_DT legitimate_JJ demand_NN apart_RB altogether_RB from_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO the_DT revenue_NN from_IN illicit_JJ consumption_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT legitimate_JJ demand_NN among_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP in_IN connection_NN with_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ festivals_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN among_IN the_DT labouring_NN and_CC agricultural_JJ classes_NNS ._.
The_DT view_NN I_PRP formed_VBD with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT circular_NN which_WDT was_VBD issued_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Westmacott_NNP with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN exterminating_VBG the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN in_IN village_NN lands_NNS was_VBD that_IN such_JJ extermination_NN was_VBD not_RB practi-_JJ cable_NN ,_, at_IN all_DT events_NNS in_IN a_DT district_NN like_IN Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT attempt_NN to_TO carry_VB it_PRP out_RP would_MD cause_VB a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN harassment_NN and_CC annoyance_NN to_TO the_DT villagers_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS are_VBP glad_JJ to_TO have_VB the_DT plants_NNS removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ lands_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ growing_VBG in_IN very_RB large_JJ quantities_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP have_VBP no_DT special_JJ desire_NN to_TO have_VB one_CD or_CC two_CD plants_NNS remov-_JJ ed_NN from_IN their_PRP$ ``_`` baris_NN ,_, ''_'' where_WRB they_PRP do_VBP no_DT harm_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ in_IN great_JJ abundance_NN in_IN Bhag-_NNP alpur_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB the_DT prohibition_NN could_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN without_IN harassment_NN and_CC interference_NN by_IN the_DT police_NN ,_, because_IN ,_, although_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ evidence_NN against_IN the_DT person_NN in_IN whose_WP$ lands_NNS it_PRP grows_VBZ ,_, a_DT large_JJ amount_NN of_IN labour_NN would_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO exterminate_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC therefore_RB the_DT people_NNS would_MD not_RB be_VB likely_RB to_TO undertake_VB the_DT labour_NN of_IN doing_VBG it_PRP themselves_PRP ._.

I_PRP EMPRESS_VBP versus_JJ CHAMAN_NNP SINGH_NNP ._.
This_DT man_NN ,_, Chaman_NNP Singh_NNP (_( Rajput_NNP ,_, cultivator_NN )_) ,_, murdered_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN on_IN the_DT morning_NN of_IN 19th_CD June_NNP 1893_CD ,_, but_CC was_VBD acquitted_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN insanity_NN by_IN the_DT Officiating_NNP Sessions_NNP Judge_NNP of_IN Bhagalpur_NNP on_IN 11th_CD September_NNP 1893_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT mention_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT ``_`` First_JJ Information_NNP Report_NNP ''_'' of_IN the_DT police_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT pro-_JJ ceedings_NNS of_IN the_DT Committing_NNP Magistrate_NNP ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP records_NNS :_: ``_`` The_DT defendant_NN was_VBD all_DT along_IN a_DT sane_NN man_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP always_RB pulled_VBD well_RB with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD generally_RB known_VBN as_IN a_DT woman_NN of_IN good_JJ character_NN ._.
His_PRP$ cousin_NN and_CC uncle_NN ,_, Babuan_NNP Singh_NNP and_CC Kasi_NNP Singh_NNP ,_, who_WP live_VBP very_RB close_RB to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, deposed_VBD that_IN ,_, just_RB before_IN the_DT occurrence_NN ,_, he_PRP asked_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN to_TO cook_VB for_IN him_PRP ,_, as_IN he_PRP took_VBD no_DT food_NN on_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN said_VBD she_PRP will_MD do_VB it_PRP a_DT little_JJ after_IN ._.
Besides_IN this_DT ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN he_PRP had_VBD even_RB any_DT altercation_NN with_IN hiswife_NN ._. ''_''
Before_IN the_DT Sessions_NNP Judge_NNP the_DT uncle_NN ,_, Kasi_NNP Singh_NNP ,_, said_VBD of_IN the_DT accused_VBN :_: ``_`` He_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN taking_VBG ganja_NN and_CC bhang_NN occasionally_RB ._.
He_PRP took_VBD it_PRP at_IN an_DT interval_NN of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ;_: but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB if_IN he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP that_DT day_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP he_PRP became_VBD bad-tempered_JJ ._.
I_PRP never_RB take_VBP it_PRP ._. ''_''
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT cousin_NN ,_, Babuan_NNP Singh_NNP ,_, deposed_VBD :_: ``_`` He_PRP never_RB took_VBD ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ._.
If_IN my_PRP$ uncle_NN Kasi_NNP says_VBZ so_RB ,_, I_PRP can_MD only_RB say_VB I_PRP never_RB saw_VBD him_PRP ._. ''_''
Another_DT witness_NN says_VBZ :_: ``_`` I_PRP never_RB saw_VBD him_PRP take_VB ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ._. ''_''
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT other_JJ mention_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT record_NN of_IN evidence_NN ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ letter_NN of_IN 17th_CD July_NNP 1893_CD to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, the_DT Sessions_NNP Judge_NNP specially_RB asked_VBD whether_IN the_DT prisoner_NN ``_`` appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT subject_NN of_IN mania_NN due_JJ to_TO taking_VBG hemp_NN in_IN any_DT form_NN ._. ''_''
This_DT special_JJ question_NN was_VBD not_RB answer-_JJ ed_NN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, nor_CC was_VBD he_PRP asked_VBD about_IN this_DT matter_NN when_WRB examined_VBN as_IN a_DT witness_NN in_IN Court_NNP ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS evidence_NN is_VBZ merely_RB ,_, ``_`` I_PRP believe_VBP him_PRP to_TO be_VB a_DT man_NN of_IN unsound_JJ mind_NN ._.
His_PRP$ appear-_JJ ance_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT man_NN suffering_VBG from_IN monomania_NN ._.
His_PRP$ mania_NN refers_NNS only_RB to_TO his_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
He_PRP admits_VBZ having_VBG killed_VBN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, and_CC expresses_VBZ no_DT regret_NN for_IN having_VBG done_VBN so_RB ,_, although_IN he_PRP admits_VBZ she_PRP had_VBD done_VBN nothing_NN wrong_JJ ._.
He_PRP says_VBZ it_PRP came_VBD into_IN his_PRP$ mind_NN that_IN he_PRP should_MD kill_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP were_VBD alive_JJ again_RB ,_, he_PRP would_MD kill_VB her_PRP ._. ''_''

II_NNP EMPRESS_NNP versus_NN PITHU_NNP SONTHAL_NNP ._.

The_DT Committing_NNP Magistrate_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` The_DT acts_NNS of_IN mad-_JJ ness_NN referred_VBD to_TO appear_VB to_TO me_PRP to_TO be_VB an_DT after-_JJ thought_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP deposes_VBZ to_TO having_VBG watched_VBN accused_VBN from_IN the_DT day_NN he_PRP was_VBD brought_VBN in_IN and_CC noticed_VBD no_DT signs_NNS of_IN lunacy_NN what-_JJ ever_RB ._. ''_''
It_PRP may_MD be_VB noticed_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ evidence_NN says_VBZ :_: ``_`` He_PRP is_VBZ very_RB quiet_JJ and_CC silent_JJ ,_, due_JJ to_TO depression_NN of_IN the_DT mind_NN ._. ''_''
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT mention_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ record_NN ;_: nor_CC is_VBZ there_RB any_DT explanation_NN assigned_VBN by_IN any_DT witness_NN of_IN the_DT alleged_JJ madness_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT one_CD witness_NN says_VBZ :_: ``_`` Accused_VBD 's_POS only_RB child_JJ died_VBD during_IN the_DT Bandna_NNP festival_NN ._. III_NNP ._.
EMPRESS_NNP versus_NN GANGA_NNP SONTHAL_NNP ._.
Ganga_NNP Sonthal_NNP ,_, a_DT cultivator_NN ,_, was_VBD charged_VBN with_IN murdering_VBG his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, Durgi_NNP Sonthalin_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD married_VBN a_DT second_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB his_PRP$ own_JJ sister_NN ,_, a_DT child_NN of_IN 9_CD or_CC 10_CD years_NNS ,_, named_VBN Gora_NNP Sonthalin_NNP ._.
Two_CD other_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD also_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN assaulted_VBN by_IN him_PRP ._.
This_DT was_VBD on_IN 7th_CD January_NNP 1893_CD (_( Saturday_NNP )_) about_IN midnight_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD sen-_RB tenced_JJ to_TO death_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT High_NNP Court_NNP directed_VBD that_DT evidence_NN be_VB taken_VBN as_IN to_TO his_PRP$ sanity_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP testified_VBD :_: ``_`` From_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN my_PRP$ observation_NN ,_, or_CC very_RB soon_RB after_IN ,_, he_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO me_PRP to_TO exhibit_VB symptoms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ._.
*_NN *_VBD His_PRP$ demeanour_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT lunatic_JJ ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP that_IN this_DT state_NN of_IN mind_NN continues_VBZ ._. ''_''
On_IN this_DT the_DT High_JJ Court_NNP ,_, on_IN 26th_CD April_NNP 1893_CD ,_, set_VBN aside_RP the_DT convic-_JJ tion_NN and_CC sentence_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ``_`` that_IN the_DT accused_VBN is_VBZ of_IN unsound_JJ mind_NN and_CC incapable_JJ of_IN making_VBG his_PRP$ defence_NN ._. ''_''
At_IN the_DT trial_NN Durgi_NNP 's_POS servant_JJ Arjun_NNP said_VBD :_: ``_`` The_DT prisoner_NN was_VBD not_RB drunk_JJ ._.

**_NN I_PRP never_RB saw_VBD any_DT signs_NNS of_IN insanity_NN about_IN him_PRP ._. ''_''
Another_DT witness_NN ,_, Prithu_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` When_WRB I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT prisoner_NN that_WDT night_NN ,_, I_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB any_DT signs_NNS that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN drinking_VBG He_PRP never_RB showed_VBD any_DT signs_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ._. ''_''
Later_RB he_PRP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` During_IN t0his_NN festival_NN the_DT Sonthals_NNP drink_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP had_VBD all_DT drunk_NN on_IN the_DT Friday_NNP ._. ''_''
Three_CD other_JJ witnesses_NNS said_VBD ,_, they_PRP saw_VBD no_DT signs_NNS of_IN drink_NN in_IN the_DT prisoner_NN that_WDT night_NN ,_, The_DT prisoner_NN simply_RB denied_VBD the_DT murder_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP could_MD not_RB explain_VB the_DT blood-stains_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ clothes_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT committal_JJ order_NN the_DT Magistrate_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN on_IN a_DT night_NN during_IN the_DT Bandna_NNP festival_NN on_IN 7th_CD January_NNP ,_, when_WRB all_DT Sonthals_NNP ,_, what-_JJ ever_RB they_PRP say_VBP ,_, are_VBP more_RBR or_CC less_JJR drunk_NN ,_, the_DT prisoner_NN committed_VBD the_DT murders_NNS with_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD charg-_JJ ed_NN ._. ''_''
*_NN *_VBZ ``_`` In_IN fact_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN he_PRP generally_RB ran_VBD amok_RB as_IN Malays_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO do_VB ._. ''_''

17_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP K._NNP G._NNP GUPTA_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP of_IN Excise_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
During_IN my_PRP$ 20_CD years_NNS '_POS service_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP worked_VBN in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Lower_NNP Bengal_NNP and_CC Orissa_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN Subdivisional_JJ Officer_NNP and_CC afterwards_NNS as_IN District_NNP officer_NN had_VBD to_TO administer_VB excise_NN in_IN my_PRP$ jurisdic-_JJ tion_NN ._.
Latterly_RB I_PRP was_VBD Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Board_NNP of_IN Revenue_NNP for_IN four_CD years_NNS and_CC had_VBD charge_NN of_IN excise_NN ._.
In_IN 1891_CD I_PRP acted_VBD as_IN Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN four_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC have_VBP been_VBN permanently_RB appointed_VBN to_TO the_DT post_NN since_IN March_NNP last_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT definitions_NNS may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN ._.
The_DT three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN defined_VBN here_RB have_VBP reference_NN to_TO the_DT Rajshahi_NNP drug_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ almost_RB exclusively_RB used_VBN in_IN these_DT provinces_NNS ._.
The_DT flat_JJ ganja_NN retains_VBZ the_DT larger_JJR twigs_NNS and_CC the_DT round_NN ganja_VBD the_DT smaller_JJR ones_NNS ,_, while_IN chur_NN has_VBZ only_RB the_DT detach-_JJ ed_NN flower_NN tops_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ thus_RB more_RBR woody_JJ matter_NN in_IN round_NN than_IN in_IN chur_NN ,_, and_CC most_JJS in_IN flat_JJ ._.
Gurjat_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ treated_VBN as_IN a_DT separate_JJ ganja_NN ,_, is_VBZ used_VBN to_TO a_DT small_JJ extent_NN in_IN Orissa_NNP ._.
In_IN shape_NN it_PRP is_VBZ like_IN flat_JJ ganja_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB everywhere_RB in_IN Lower_NNP Bengal_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Behar_NNP and_CC Orissa_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ somewhat_RB scarce_JJ in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP division_NN ;_: but_CC elsewhere_IN it_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB abundant_JJ ,_, especially_RB in_IN Champaran_NNP ,_, Monghyr_NNP ,_, Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, Purnea_NNP ,_, Rungpur_NNP ,_, Jessore_NNP ,_, etc_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
General_NNP name_NN bhang_NN ._.
Siddhi_NNP (_( specially_RB in_IN Lower_NNP Bengal_NNP )_) ._.
Patti_NNP or_CC subji_NN (_( in_IN Orissa_NNP )_) ._.
Thandai_NNP (_( cooler_NN )_) (_( specially_RB in_IN Behar_NNP )_) ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP flourishes_VBZ in_IN a_DT damp_JJ loose_JJ alluvial_JJ soil_NN ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN rainfall_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB material_JJ ,_, pro-_JJ vided_VBN there_EX is_VBZ sufficient_JJ moisture_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ thus_RB found_VBN abundantly_RB in_IN such_JJ distant_JJ localities_NNS as_IN the_DT extreme_JJ North-West_NNP of_IN Behar_NNP (_( Champaran_NNP )_) and_CC the_DT North-East_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP (_( Mymensing_VBG )_) ._.
lt_NN does_VBZ not_RB like_VB a_DT dry_JJ laterite_NN soil_NN ,_, but_CC grows_VBZ luxuri-_JJ antly_RB in_IN the_DT chur_NN lands_VBZ of_IN the_DT Ganges_NNP and_CC other_JJ rivers_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP submerged_VBN during_IN the_DT rains_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ an_DT annual_JJ plant_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Ordinarily_RB dense_NN ._.
Cultivators_NNS and_CC indigo_NN planters_NNS do_VBP their_PRP$ best_JJS to_TO keep_VB down_RP its_PRP$ growth_NN ._.
7_CD ._.

12_CD ._.
Yes_UH ._.
In_IN the_DT Gurjat_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Orissa_NNP ,_, in_IN Hill_NNP Tipperah_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN Nepal_NNP ._.

No_DT Brahmin_NNP is_VBZ required_VBN for_IN this_DT ceremony_NN ,_, nor_CC do_VBP the_DT females_NNS take_VBP part_NN in_IN the_DT proceedings_NNS ._.
Siddhi_NNP or_CC bhang_NN is_VBZ used_VBN on_IN the_DT occasions_NNS of_IN Gorakyanather_NNP puja_NN and_CC Nowami_NNP Dasserah_NNP ._.
Gorak-_NNP nath_NN signifies_VBZ the_DT deity_NN that_WDT protects_VBZ the_DT bovine_NN species_NNS ._.
When_WRB a_DT cow_NN brings_VBZ forth_NN its_PRP$ first_JJ calf_NN ,_, the_DT deity_NN is_VBZ invoked_VBN for_IN her_PRP$ well_NN being_VBG ,_, and_CC also_RB for_IN oblations_NNS offered_VBN for_IN the_DT blessings_NNS thus_RB conferred_VBN on_IN the_DT family_NN ._.

On_IN this_DT occasion_NN pills_VBZ or_CC balls_NNS are_VBP made_VBN of_IN bhang_JJ powder_NN or_CC paste_NN mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT milk_NN of_IN the_DT cow_NN and_CC sugar_NN ._.
The_DT pills_NNS are_VBP then_RB distributed_VBN among_IN the_DT cowherds_NNS and_CC others_NNS ,_, who_WP chant_VBP a_DT legend_NN of_IN Goraknath_NNP ._.
The_DT pills_NNS or_CC balls_NNS are_VBP eaten_VBN after_IN the_DT chanting_NN ceases_NNS ._.

34_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

13_CD ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ restricted_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP to_TO a_DT compact_JJ tract_NN of_IN country_NN with_IN a_DT radius_NN of_IN about_IN sixteen_JJ miles_NNS lying_VBG in_IN three_CD districts_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, Rajshahi_NNP ,_, Diuajpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Bogra_NNP ._.

21_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_JJ gives_VBZ the_DT consumption_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT different_JJ divisions_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN five_CD years:178_NNS contain_VBP a_DT large_JJ amount_NN of_IN useless_JJ wood_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN if_IN a_DT man_NN purchases_NNS a_DT seer_NN of_IN flat_JJ or_CC round_JJ ganja_NN he_PRP really_RB consumes_VBZ 12_CD or_CC 14_CD chittacks_NNS ,_, throwing_VBG away_RB the_DT remaining_VBG 4_CD or_CC 2_CD chittacks_NNS as_IN useless_JJ wood_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, possible_JJ to_TO apply_VB the_DT cor-_JJ rections_NNS for_IN the_DT different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN exported_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT published_VBN reports_NNS give_VB only_RB the_DT total_JJ quantity_NN exported_VBN every_DT year_NN ,_, without_IN distinguish-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT different_JJ varieties_NNS ._.

The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT quantity_NN of_IN ganja_NN exported_VBN into_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, the_DT revenue_NN derived_VBN from_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT rate_NN of_IN duty_NN on_IN chur_NN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT chur_JJ equivalent_NN of_IN ganja_NN so_RB exported:179_RB Applied_NNP to_TO the_DT particular_JJ drug_NN (_( ganja_NN )_) of_IN which_WDT I_PRP am_VBP now_RB speaking_VBG ,_, the_DT above_JJ test_NN is_VBZ rather_RB diffi-_JJ cult_NN of_IN application_NN ._.
For_IN if_IN we_PRP discard_VBP the_DT quan-_JJ titative_JJ test_NN (_( i.e._NN ,_, the_DT test_NN of_IN regarding_VBG one_CD to_TO be_VB moderate_JJ who_WP consumes_VBZ so_RB much_JJ ganja_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD to_TO be_VB excessive_JJ who_WP consumes_VBZ more_JJR than_IN that_DT quantity_NN )_) ,_, we_PRP can_MD have_VB no_DT means_NNS of_IN determining_VBG what_WP proportion_NN of_IN ganja_NN smokers_NNS are_VBP moderate_JJ ,_, and_CC what_WP proportion_NN excessive_NN ,_, without_IN a_DT detailed_JJ inquiry_NN into_IN the_DT habits_NNS and_CC circumstances_NNS of_IN each_DT particular_JJ individual_NN ._.

Ganja_NNP smoking_NN is_VBZ a_DT habit_NN seen_VBN rarely_RB amongst_IN the_DT higher_JJR classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN this_DT province_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO the_DT lower_JJR orders_NNS ._.
Now_RB ,_, moderation_NN is_VBZ a_DT virtue_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT lower_JJR orders_NNS of_IN no_DT country_NN is_VBZ conspicuous_JJ ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP conspicuous_JJ for_IN the_DT opposite_JJ quality_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, extra-_JJ vagance_NN in_IN expenditure_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO marriage_VB ,_, drinks_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB far_RB from_IN the_DT truth_NN to_TO say_VB that_IN a_DT man_NN belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT lower_JJR orders_NNS will_MD spend_VB in_IN his_PRP$ drink_NN or_CC habitual_JJ narcotic_JJ as_RB much_RB as_IN he_PRP can_MD conveniently_RB afford_VB ,_, i.e._FW ,_, a_DT man_NN of_IN his_PRP$ class_NN will_MD consume_VB as_IN much_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ favorite_JJ intoxicant_NN as_IN his_PRP$ means_NNS will_MD allow_VB ._.
Consequently_RB we_PRP arrive_VBP at_IN the_DT conclusion_NN that_WDT ordinarily_RB a_DT ganja_NN smoker_NN will_MD set_VB no_DT limit_NN to_TO his_PRP$ use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT which_WDT will_MD be_VB impos-_JJ ed_NN by_IN his_PRP$ resources_NNS ._.
He_PRP will_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB glad_VBN to_TO consume_VB the_DT drug_NN as_IN often_RB and_CC as_RB much_JJ as_IN his_PRP$ means_NNS will_MD allow_VB ._.
Judged_VBN by_IN the_DT test_NN of_IN moderation_NN set_VBN forth_RB above_IN ,_, every_DT such_JJ man_NN should_MD be_VB regard-_JJ ed_NN as_IN an_DT excessive_JJ consumer_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP is_VBZ always_RB ready_JJ to_TO consume_VB the_DT drug_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ only_RB prevented_VBN from_IN doing_VBG so_RB by_IN want_NN of_IN means_NNS ._.
As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS have_VBP so_RB little_JJ to_TO spare_VB after_IN satisfying_VBG the_DT first_JJ necessities_NNS of_IN life_NN ,_, that_IN what_WP little_VBD they_PRP spend_VBP in_IN ganja_NN can_MD hardly_RB be_VB said_VBD to_TO make_VB them_PRP excessive_JJ consumers_NNS in_IN any_DT sense_NN of_IN the_DT term_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, there_EX are_VBP people_NNS possessed_VBN of_IN better_JJR means_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, though_IN they_PRP may_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN consuming_VBG the_DT drug_NN only_RB at_IN stated_VBN hours_NNS of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, consume_VB it_PRP at_IN those_DT hours_NNS in_IN such_PDT a_DT large_JJ quantity_NN that_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB called_VBN moderate_JJ in_IN any_DT sense_NN of_IN the_DT term_NN ._.
Here_RB then_RB ultimately_RB we_PRP shall_MD have_VB to_TO fall_VB back_RB on_IN a_DT quantitative_JJ test_NN if_IN we_PRP wish_VBP to_TO distinguish_VB moderate_NN from_IN excessive_JJ consumers_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP taken_VBN some_DT statistics_NNS on_IN this_DT point_NN ._.
The_DT ganja_NN shop_NN at_IN this_DT town_NN of_IN English_NNP bazar_NN sells_VBZ ganja_NN at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN R20_NNP a_DT seer_NN ._.
I_PRP inquired_VBD of_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP come_VBP to_TO purchase_VB ganja_NN ,_, at_IN this_DT shop_NN as_IN to_TO their_PRP$ daily_JJ consumption_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.

[_VB a_DT (_( A_NNP )_) ]_VBZ The_DT ganja_NN seeds_NNS are_VBP sown_VBN in_IN a_DT wet_NN ground_NN and_CC when_WRB the_DT seedlings_NNS grow_VBP they_PRP are_VBP transplanted_VBN ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP W._NNP C._NNP FASSON_NNP ,_, District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Bogra_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
As_IN District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP of_IN Bogra_NNP ,_, in_IN parts_NNS of_IN which_WDT ganja_NN is_VBZ cultivated_VBN ,_, in_IN which_WDT also_RB the_DT wild_JJ bhang_NN grows_NNS ;_: by_IN enquiries_NNS from_IN Police_NNP officers_NNS and_CC Babu_NNP Kasi_NNP Chunder_NNP Guho_NNP ,_, Officiating_NNP Inspector_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ long_RB experi-_JJ ence_NN of_IN Bogra_NNP District_NNP ;_: and_CC by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN cultivators_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Flat_JJ ganja_NN is_VBZ called_VBN ``_`` chepti_NN ''_'' ;_: round_VB ganja_NN is_VBZ called_VBN ``_`` gol_NN ''_'' ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

(_( The_DT above_NN process_NN is_VBZ adopted_VBN after_IN one_CD day_NN of_IN sun_NN drying_NN )_) ._.

93_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MAHAMAHOPADHYA_NNP MAHESA_NNP CHANDRA_NNP NYAYARATNA_NNP ,_, C._NNP I._NNP E._NNP ,_, Brahmin_NNP ,_, Principal_NNP ,_, Government_NNP Sanskrit_NNP College_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ._.

In_IN my_PRP$ practice_NN outside_IN of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS my_PRP$ experience_NN is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO very_RB few_JJ cases270_NN use_NN generally_RB ._.
