Further_RB ,_, I_PRP here_RB refer_VBP entirely_RB to_TO the_DT native_JJ com-_JJ munity_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ observation_NN that_IN when_WRB a_DT native_JJ takes_VBZ to_TO alcohol_VB it_PRP is_VBZ extremely_RB difficult_JJ for_IN him_PRP to_TO remain_VB moderate_JJ ;_: and_CC in_IN life_NN assurance_NN work_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP a_DT good_JJ deal_NN ,_, I_PRP always_RB advise_VBP an_DT extra_JJ premium_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT native_NN who_WP indulges_VBZ in_IN alcohol_NN even_RB in_IN the_DT most_RBS moderate_JJ way_NN ,_, and_CC utterly_RB refuse_NN to_TO accept_VB a_DT native_JJ life_NN if_IN there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN alcohol_NN to_TO any_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD still_RB be_VB con-_JJ sidered_JJ moderate_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS ._.
This_DT of_IN course_NN refers_NNS only_RB to_TO the_DT upper_JJ classes_NNS who_WP come_VBP for_IN life_NN assurance_NN ._.
But_CC my_PRP$ experience_NN leads_VBZ me_PRP to_TO hold_VB the_DT same_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN alcohol_NN on_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS ._.
A_DT native_NN who_WP takes_VBZ to_TO liquor_VB is_VBZ lost_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ founded_VBN on_IN my_PRP$ hospital_NN experience_NN and_CC my_PRP$ experience_NN as_IN a_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP decidedly_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN in_IN Bengal_NNP alcohol_NN is_VBZ absolutely_RB evil_JJ ._.
I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ of_IN the_DT large_JJ extent_NN to_TO which_WDT alcohol_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN probably_RB more_RBR than_IN ganja_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, because_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ so_RB much_JJ cheaper_JJR ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD still_RB place_VB alcohol_NN first_RB ._.
I_PRP regard_VBP it_PRP as_IN most_RBS deleterious_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT comparison_NN of_IN evils_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT evils_NNS of_IN alcohol_NN seem_VBP to_TO me_PRP to_TO over-balance_JJ al-_JJ together_RB the_DT evils_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD instance_NN my_PRP$ own_JJ darwan_NN ,_, who_WP takes_VBZ ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN in_IN excess_JJ ,_, but_CC is_VBZ always_RB at_IN his_PRP$ post_NN and_CC capable_NN of_IN doing_VBG his_PRP$ duty_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP took_VBD alcohol_NN in_IN excess_NN to_TO the_DT same_JJ extent_NN hewould_NN be_VB useless_JJ to_TO me_PRP and_CC utterly_RB untrustworthy_JJ ._.
Then_RB I_PRP think_VBP also_RB that_IN the_DT social_JJ evils_NNS of_IN alcohol_NN in_IN excess_NN are_VBP much_JJ greater_JJR ._.
The_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN this_DT country_NN would_MD never_RB lead_VB to_TO the_DT misery_NN produced_VBN by_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN alcohol_NN ,_, say_VBP ,_, in_IN Scotland_NNP or_CC London_NNP ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN may_MD be_VB to_TO produce_VB a_DT sudden_JJ outburst_NN of_IN violence_NN which_WDT would_MD naturally_RB lead_VB to_TO the_DT incarceration_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN in_IN an_DT asylum_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ not_RB the_DT character_NN and_CC result_NN of_IN alcoholic_JJ excess_NN ._.
It_PRP leads_VBZ to_TO more_RBR chronic_JJ misery_NN ._.
Alcohol_NNP also_RB produces_VBZ disease_NN of_IN almost_RB every_DT internal_JJ organ_NN and_CC premature_JJ death_NN ._.
Dysentery_NNP is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO ganja_VB ;_: but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB of_IN any_DT good_JJ ground_NN for_IN that_DT belief_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN that_IN I_PRP know_VBP of_IN in_IN the_DT known_JJ physiological_JJ action_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP should_MD cause_VB dysentery_NN ._.
Chest_JJS affections_NNS are_VBP also_RB attributed_VBN to_TO ganja_VB ;_: but_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT reliable_JJ information_NN to_TO give_VB on_IN that_DT subject_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP of_IN no_DT other_JJ disease_NN which_WDT the_DT drug_NN causes_VBZ ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO opium_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD distinguish_VB be-_JJ tween_JJ opium-eating_JJ and_CC opium-smoking_JJ ,_, taking_VBG first_JJ opium-smoking_NN ._.
Like_IN ganja_NN ,_, opium_NN is_VBZ smoked_VBN in_IN company_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB an_DT incen-_JJ tive_NN to_TO idleness_VB ,_, dissipation_NN ,_, and_CC bad_JJ company_NN ,_, with_IN all_DT its_PRP$ results_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN smoking_VBG opium_NN obtains_VBZ a_DT firmer_JJR hold_NN on_IN the_DT smoker_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB very_RB expensive_JJ ,_, which_WDT ganja_VBP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, and_CC leads_VBZ sooner_NN to_TO the_DT ruin_NN of_IN the_DT individual_NN and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, opium-smoking_NN does_VBZ not_RB lead_VB to_TO the_DT commission_NN of_IN violent_JJ acts_NNS ,_, and_CC apart_RB from_IN the_DT individual_NN and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, leads_VBZ to_TO no_DT general_JJ evil_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT community_NN at_IN large_JJ ._.
After_IN his_PRP$ smoke_NN he_PRP walks_VBZ quietly_RB home_VBN and_CC does_VBZ no_DT harm_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT ganja_NN smoker_NN is_VBZ liable_JJ to_TO sudden_JJ outbursts_NNS of_IN violence_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD lead_VB to_TO murder_VB sometimes_RB of_IN a_DT wholesale_JJ kind_NN ._.
My_PRP$ experience_NN leads_VBZ me_PRP to_TO believe_VB that_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ generally_RB smoked_VBN in_IN com-_JJ pany_NN ._.
And_CC my_PRP$ statement_NN regarding_VBG outbursts_NNS of_IN violence_NN from_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN my_PRP$ knowledge_NN of_IN cases_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN before_IN the_DT criminal_JJ courts_NNS ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO opium-eating_NN ,_, the_DT opium-_JJ eater_NN is_VBZ as_IN a_DT rule_NN a_DT respectable_JJ ,_, well-doing_JJ member_NN of_IN society_NN ,_, who_WP takes_VBZ his_PRP$ opium_NN pills_NNS before_IN leav-_JJ ing_VBG his_PRP$ house_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, goes_VBZ about_IN his_PRP$ busi-_JJ ness_NN ,_, and_CC returns_NNS without_IN any_DT apparent_JJ effect_NN from_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT respectable_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN corresponding_VBG to_TO this271_VB also_RB be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO examine_VB a_DT maniac_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT pupils_NNS are_VBP certainly_RB not_RB dilated_VBN as_IN with_IN belladonna_NN ,_, nor_CC contracted_VBD to_TO a_DT pin_NN point_NN as_IN with_IN opium_NN ._.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS of_IN acute_NN mania_NN ganja_NN may_MD be_VB the_DT exciting_JJ cause_NN with_IN another_DT cause_NN as_IN predis-_JJ posing_NN ._.
Transient_NNP mania_NN can_MD not_RB easily_RB be_VB dis-_JJ tinguished_VBN from_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN mania_NN ;_: but_CC one_CD gets_VBZ accustomed_VBN to_TO the_DT physiognomy_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN ganja_NN intoxication_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT you_PRP recognize_VBP the_DT case_NN as_IN one_CD of_IN more_JJR than_IN probable_JJ ganja_NN mania_NN ._.
The_DT chief_JJ points_NNS are_VBP the_DT extreme_JJ vehemence_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC the_DT alert_NN ,_, excited_JJ appearance_NN as_IN of_IN keen_JJ intelligence_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO describe_VB ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ the_DT history_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
Cases_NNS of_IN transient_NN mania_NN occurring_VBG in_IN Europe_NNP are_VBP ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, characterized_VBN by_IN extreme_JJ violence_NN and_CC homicidal_NN mania_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD symptom_NN by_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN transient_NN mania_NN could_MD be_VB distinguished_VBN from_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN mania_NN ._.
These_DT cases_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP are_VBP very_RB often_RB associated_VBN with_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN alcohol_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP attended_VBN with_IN homicidal_JJ impulses_NNS ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB aware_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ occurring_NN in_IN any_DT one_CD class_NN of_IN society_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ in_IN regard_NN to_TO hemp_VB drug_NN mania_IN an_DT ab-_JJ sence_NN of_IN any_DT typical_JJ symptom_NN ._.
In_IN any_DT indivi-_JJ dual_JJ case_NN the_DT diagnosis_NN would_MD depend_VB on_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN ganja_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN cases_NNS you_PRP would_MD anticipate_VB the_DT ganja_JJ history_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT experience_NN of_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN cases_NNS would_MD lead_VB one_CD to_TO predicate_VB ganja_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT would_MD be_VB more_RBR or_CC less_JJR of_IN an_DT assumption272_NN lunatics_NNS admitted_VBD to_TO asylums_VB whose_WP$ insanity_NN is_VBZ caused_VBN by_IN ganja_NN ._.
But_CC they_PRP may_MD be_VB fairly_RB taken_VBN to_TO represent_VB the_DT proportion_NN which_WDT ganja-smokers_NNS bear_VBP to_TO the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ how_WRB I_PRP have_VBP regarded_VBN it_PRP ._.
By_IN ganja-_JJ smokers_NNS I_PRP mean_VBP people_NNS who_WP have_VBP used_VBN the_DT drug_NN in_IN any_DT degree_NN ._.
What_WP I_PRP mean_VBP is_VBZ that_IN as_IN practically_RB every_DT smoker_NN 's_POS insanity_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS to_TO ganja_VB ,_, the_DT returns_NNS really_RB show_VBP ,_, not_RB the_DT number_NN who_WP have_VBP gone_VBN mad_JJ from_IN using_VBG ganja_NN ,_, but_CC merely_RB the_DT number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS who_WP are_VBP also_RB ganja-_JJ smokers_NNS or_CC have_VBP used_VBN the_DT drug_NN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ all_DT I_PRP find_VBP in_IN the_DT returns_NNS ._.
To_TO ascertain_VB the_DT effects_NNS of_IN ganja_NN in_IN producing_VBG insanity_NN it_PRP would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO compare_VB this_DT proportion_NN of_IN ganja-smokers_NNS inside_IN the_DT asylum_NN with_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN ganja-_JJ smokers_NNS in_IN the_DT outside_JJ population_NN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ ,_, if_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN smokers_NNS outside_IN was_VBD ten_VBN per_IN cent_NN ._.
and_CC the_DT proportion_NN of_IN smokers_NNS inside_IN was_VBD thirty_JJ per_IN cent._NN ,_, then_RB two-thirds_NNS of_IN the_DT ganja-smokers_NNS inside_IN the_DT asylum_NN may_MD legitimately_RB be_VB taken_VBN as_IN insane_NN through_IN ganja_NN ._.
I_PRP could_MD give_VB no_DT reliable_JJ idea_NN whatever_WDT as_IN to_TO what_WP is_VBZ the_DT proportion_NN outside_IN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN for_IN native_JJ evidence_NN mainly_RB ._.
Therefore_RB I_PRP can_MD give_VB no_DT reliable_JJ idea_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT amount_NN of_IN insanity_NN really_RB due_JJ to_TO ganja_VB ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP myself_PRP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT only_JJ justification_NN of_IN the_DT comparison_NN of_IN these_DT proportions_NNS inside_IN and_CC outside_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ that_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ an_DT ascertained_JJ cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
In_IN comparing_VBG these_DT proportions_NNS we_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO remember_VB the_DT classes_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT lunatics_NNS come_VBP to_TO our_PRP$ asylums_NNS ._.
Taking_VBG now_RB the_DT records_NNS shown_VBN me_PRP of_IN all_PDT the_DT so-called_JJ ganja_NN cases_NNS admitted_VBN in_IN Dacca_NNP in_IN 1887_CD (_( my_PRP$ last_JJ year_NN )_) I_PRP find273_VBP Faridpur_NNP with_IN a_DT certificate_NN from_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Sur-_NNP geon_NN ,_, dated_VBD 19th_CD June_NNP 1877_CD ._.
This_DT certificate_NN stated_VBD that_IN he_PRP ``_`` has_VBZ a_DT vacant_JJ look_NN ,_, is_VBZ slow_JJ and_CC hesitating_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ speech_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB sleep_VB much_RB ,_, re-_JJ mains_NNS in_IN one_CD position_NN quietly_RB for_IN hours_NNS together_RB ,_, does_VBZ not_RB speak_VB to_TO anybody_NN unless_IN questioned_VBN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB cries_NNS ._.
In_IN fact_NN he_PRP has_VBZ the_DT look_NN of_IN a_DT confirmed_JJ lunatic_JJ ,_, although_IN he_PRP had_VBD no_DT fit_NN of_IN excite-_JJ ment_NN while_IN in_IN this_DT jail_NN ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO jail_NN for_IN having_VBG killed_VBN six_CD of_IN his_PRP$ relatives_NNS in_IN a_DT fit_NN of_IN excitement_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT Descriptive_NNP Roll_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 6th_CD June_NNP ,_, signed_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP and_CC forwarded_VBN with_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ ,_, showed_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN insane_JJ ``_`` two_CD months_NNS ''_'' ;_: that_IN ``_`` pre-_JJ vious_JJ to_TO arrest_VB he_PRP was_VBD addicted_VBN to_TO opium_VB and_CC ganja_VB ''_'' ;_: that_IN the_DT cause_NN assigned_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ insanity_NN was_VBD ``_`` his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN addiction_NN to_TO ganja_VB and_CC opium_VB ''_'' ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN were_VBD that_IN ``_`` some_DT time_NN before_IN the_DT murders_NNS he_PRP became_VBD deranged_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ mind_NN on_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ addiction_NN to_TO ganja_VB ,_, brought_VBN on_IN a_DT fit_NN of_IN insanity_NN under_IN which_WDT the_DT crime_NN was_VBD committed_VBN ._. ''_''
In_IN their_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.
11_CD of_IN 25th_CD March_NNP 1878_CD ,_, the_DT Visitors_NNS of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP reported_VBD that_IN the_DT man_NN ``_`` is_VBZ now_RB rational_JJ and_CC fit_JJ to_TO stand_VB his_PRP$ trial_NN ._. ''_''
Under_IN orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP he_PRP was_VBD accordingly_RB forwarded_VBN to_TO Goalundo_VB to_TO be_VB tried_VBN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD acquitted_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, and_CC readmitted_VBD to_TO the_DT Asylum_NNP under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP ,_, com-_NN municated_VBN in_IN Judicial_NNP Department_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
2947_CD ,_, dated_VBD 19th_CD July_NNP 1878_CD ._.
In_IN their_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.
111_CD ,_, dated_VBD 27th_CD June_NNP 1885_CD ,_, the_DT Visitors_NNS reported_VBD to_TO the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP that_IN they_PRP ``_`` are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN he_PRP continues_VBZ sane_NN as_IN reported_VBN in_IN January_NNP last_JJ ,_, and_CC beg_NN to_TO draw_VB attention_NN to_TO their_PRP$ recommenda-_JJ tion_NN that_IN he_PRP be_VB discharged_VBN ._. ''_''
The_DT Government_NNP ordered_VBD that_IN he_PRP be_VB employed_VBN in_IN a_DT jail_NN as_IN a_DT work-_JJ overseer_NN or_CC servant_NN on_IN light_JJ labour_NN ._.
He_PRP left_VBD the_DT Asylum_NNP accordingly_RB ._.
The_DT records_NNS of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ case_NN have_VBP also_RB been_VBN perused_VBN ._.
They_PRP show_VBP that_IN this_DT man_NN was_VBD charged_VBN with_IN having_VBG ,_, on_IN 23rd_CD April_NNP 1877_CD ,_, caused_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, grandmother_NN ,_, brother_NN ,_, and_CC three_CD sisters_NNS ._.
The_DT Naib_NNP of_IN the_DT village_NN gave_VBD evidence_NN that_IN after_IN receiving_VBG the_DT information_NN from_IN the_DT prisoner_NN ,_, and_CC seeing_VBG that_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD burnt_VBN down_RP with_IN the_DT six_CD dead_JJ bodies_NNS in_IN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP asked_VBD the_DT prisoner_NN why_WRB he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN this_DT ._.
``_`` He_PRP said_VBD ,_, '_'' I_PRP did_VBD it_PRP because_IN I_PRP chose_VBP ._.
What_WP will_MD they_PRP eat_VB ?_. '_''
*_JJ *_NN I_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN that_IN since_IN prisoner_NN 's_POS mother_NN 's_POS death_NN prisoner_NN had_VBD been_VBN strange_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ manner_NN ._.
He_PRP would_MD not_RB speak_VB to_TO people_NNS ,_, but_CC would_MD sit_VB still_RB moping_VBG ._.
On_IN the_DT day_NN previous_JJ to_TO this_DT occurrence_NN the_DT father_NN mentioned_VBD this_DT fact_NN to_TO me_PRP ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT mother_NN 's_POS death_NN the_DT prisoner_NN appeared_VBD to_TO me_PRP perfectly_RB sane_VBP and_CC rational_JJ ._.
*_JJ *_NN I_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN that_IN prisoner_NN used_VBN to_TO take_VB both_DT ganja_NNS and_CC opium_NN ._.
His_PRP$ father_NN several_JJ times_NNS told_VBD me_PRP of_IN this_DT ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB what_WP prisoner_NN meant_VBN by_IN saying_VBG ,_, 'what_WP will_MD they_PRP eat_VB ?_. '_''
His_PRP$ family_NN are_VBP in_IN comfort-_JJ able_JJ circumstances_NNS ._.
I_PRP suppose_VBP prisoner_JJ meant_NN that_IN when_WRB his_PRP$ mother_NN was_VBD gone_VBN who_WP was_VBD to_TO feed_VB them_PRP ;_: but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB tell_VB ._. ''_''
The_DT next_JJ witness_NN was_VBD a_DT near_JJ neighbour_NN ,_, who_WP said_VBD ,_, ``_`` I_PRP knew_VBD Kailash_NNP well_RB ._.
He_PRP used_VBD to_TO get_VB drunk_JJ with_IN ganja_NN and_CC opium_NN ._.
After_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN he_PRP became_VBD pagal_JJ ,_, would_MD not_RB speak_VB to_TO any_DT one_CD ,_, would_MD laugh_VB to_TO himself_PRP ,_, would_MD not_RB eat_VB ,_, and_CC used_VBD to_TO throw_VB his_PRP$ uttari_NN (_( mourning_VBG garment_NN )_) away_RB ._.
He_PRP did_VBD not_RB take_VB ganja_NN during_IN this_DT time_NN ._.
*_JJ *_NN I_PRP went_VBD to_TO inquire_VB about_IN the_DT Shradh_NNP ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD Kailash_NNP seated_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ bari_NN ._.
He_PRP would_MD speak_VB to_TO no_DT one_NN ._.
I_PRP told_VBD him_PRP not_RB to_TO be_VB downcast_JJ and_CC pagal_JJ ;_: it_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO look_VB after_IN the_DT younger_JJR members_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ family_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD very_RB fond_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ._. ''_''
A_DT third_JJ witness_NN said_VBD ,_, ``_`` I_PRP used_VBD to_TO see_VB Kailash_NNP frequently_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT occur-_JJ rence_NN ,_, I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT family_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT commotion_NN about_IN the_DT Shradh_NNP ._.
Preparations_NNS were_VBD being_VBG made_VBN *_NN *_NN ._.
After_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN ,_, he_PRP used_VBD to_TO speak_VB to_TO no_DT one_NN and_CC to_TO wander_VB about_IN and_CC some-_JJ times_NNS throw_VB his_PRP$ uttari_JJ away_RB ._.
Before_IN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD all_DT right_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD stopped_VBN taking_VBG opium_NN ,_, but_CC tookganja_NN ._. ''_''
Another_DT witness_NN ,_, a_DT priest_NN ,_, said_VBD ,_, ``_`` Kailash_NNP is_VBZ somewhat_RB of_IN a_DT pagal_NN ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ always_RB been_VBN a_DT bit_NN of_IN a_DT pagal_NN ._.
Since_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN mad_JJ ._.
He_PRP did_VBD not_RB do_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT acts_NNS which_WDT ought_MD to_TO be_VB done_VBN by_IN a_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ lost_VBN his_PRP$ mother_NN ._.
Every_DT day_NN I_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP after_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN 's_POS death_NN and_CC used_VBD to_TO speak_VB to_TO him_PRP ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT knowing_VBG what_WP he_PRP said_VBD ._.
From_IN his_PRP$ behaviour_NN and_CC acts_NNS I_PRP should_MD say_VB he_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN his_PRP$ reason_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD a_DT wife_NN ._.

It_PRP only_RB occurs_VBZ in_IN a_DT certain_JJ proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP probably_RB those_DT in_IN which_WDT predisposition_NN exists_NNS ,_, which_WDT might_MD have_VB developed_VBN insanity_NN from_IN other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT case_NN with_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN although_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS are_VBP commonly_RB consumed_VBN in_IN India_NNP and_CC are_VBP almost_RB unknown_JJ in_IN England_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN in_IN India_NNP which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO place_VB under_IN restraint_NN in_IN the_DT Government_NNP native_JJ lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP the_DT only_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ,_, in_IN India_NNP ,_, is_VBZ infinitesimal_JJ as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN public_JJ asylums_NNS in_IN England_NNP and_CC Ireland_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Ben-_NNP gal_NN Presidency_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN seventy-_JJ one_CD millions_NNS ,_, there_EX were_VBD only_RB 951_CD native_JJ lunatics_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS so_RB confined_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1892_CD ._.

Typical_JJ Symptoms.288_NNP I_PRP often_RB ask_VBP questions_NNS of_IN insane_JJ people_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT ganja_NN habit_NN ._.

Smoking_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ stronger_JJR in_IN its_PRP$ effects_NNS than_IN smoking_NN of_IN charas_NN or_CC moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN siddhi_NN ._.

Charas_NNP is_VBZ little_JJ known_JJ and_CC seldom_NN used_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, while_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ never_RB smoked_VBN and_CC only_RB used_VBD in_IN form_NN of_IN sherbet_NN and_CC for_IN medicinal_JJ purposes_NNS ._.
Up-country_JJ people_NNS ,_, who_WP reside_VBP here_RB or_CC come_VB down_RP for_IN work_NN ,_, are_VBP very_RB partial_JJ to_TO bhang_VB ;_: but_CC the_DT consumption_NN is_VBZ small_JJ ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB accur-_JJ ately_RB estimated_VBN or_CC localised_VBN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP may_MD be_VB safely_RB assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN ganja-smokers_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN are_VBP moderate_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, although_IN of_IN course_NN some_DT go_VBP to_TO excess_RB ,_, as_IN is_VBZ the_DT case_NN with_IN the_DT drinkers_NNS of_IN spirituous_JJ liquor_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ consumption_NN per_IN diem_NN of_IN ganja_NN for_IN an_DT adult_NN may_MD be_VB taken_VBN at_IN one-eight_JJ to_TO one-fourth_NN of_IN a_DT tola_NN ,_, up_RB to_TO 2_CD tolas_NNS for_IN an_DT excessive_JJ consumer_NN ,_, and_CC aggravated_JJ cases_NNS have_VBP come_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ knowledge_NN in_IN which_WDT individuals_NNS have_VBP got_VBN through_IN as_RB much_JJ as_IN half_PDT a_DT powah_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, ten_EX tolas_NNS ,_, in_IN one_CD day_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN is_VBZ about_IN 3_CD annas_NNS per_IN tola_NN ._.
In_IN rare_JJ instances_NNS I_PRP believe_VBP dhatura_NN is_VBZ mixed_JJ with_IN ganja_NN to_TO increase_VB its_PRP$ strength_NN ._.
Bhang_NNP and_CC patti_NNS are_VBP also_RB mixed_JJ together_RB with_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS and_CC spices_NNS by_IN those_DT bent_JJ on_IN complete_JJ intoxica-_JJ tion_NN ,_, but_CC such_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP the_DT exception_NN ._.
Hemp_NNP drugs_NNS are_VBP as_IN a_DT rule_NN consumed_VBN in_IN private_JJ ,_, by_IN which_WDT I_PRP mean_VBP on_IN the_DT smoker_NN 's_POS own_JJ premises_NNS ,_, especially_RB by_IN those_DT with_IN whom_WP the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT daily_JJ one_CD ;_: but_CC habitual_JJ smokers_NNS often_RB meet_VBP together_RB at_IN a_DT given_VBN place_NN and_CC pass_VB their_PRP$ leisure_NN in_IN conversation_NN ,_, refreshing_VBG and_CC exhilarating_VBG them-_JJ selves_NNS with_IN the_DT fumes_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN any_DT women_NNS ,_, except_IN those_DT of_IN loose_JJ character_NN ,_, use_VBP the_DT drug_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB among_IN that_DT class_NN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN ganja-smokers_NNS is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ._.
Instances_NNS of_IN ganja-smoking_NN among_IN children_NNS are_VBP almost_RB entirely_RB confined_VBN to_TO those_DT who_WP are_VBP being_VBG trained_VBN up_RP for_IN immoral_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP consequently_RB more_RBR in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN such_JJ tempta-_JJ tion_NN ._.
The_DT habit_NN af_JJ ganja-smoking_NN ,_, once_RB contracted_VBN ,_, is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO become_VB a_DT permanent_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC is_VBZ certainly_RB very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO break_VB off_RP ,_, and_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, especially_RB if_IN acquired_VBN very_RB early_RB in_IN life_NN ,_, is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO lead_VB to_TO its_PRP$ excessive_JJ abuse_NN ._.
Among_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, in_IN certain_JJ forms_NNS of_IN worship_NN of_IN their_PRP$ god_NN Mahadeo_NNP ,_, the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ prescribed_VBN ;_: but_CC the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN only_RB by_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS as_IN a_DT rule_NN ._.

The_DT varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP three_CD ,_, as_IN mentioned_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Prain_NNP :_: flat_JJ ganja_NN is_VBZ known_VBN in_IN this_DT Province_NNP as_IN ``_`` pamure_NN ,_, ''_'' round_NN ganja_VBD as_IN ``_`` gol_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` chur_NN ,_, ''_'' and_CC broken_VB ganja_NN as_IN ``_`` rorha_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` chur_NN ._. 3_CD ._.
The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ wild_VBP in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Shahabad_NNP and_CC Champaran_NNP and_CC also_RB Monghyr_NNP and_CC Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, and_CC rather_RB abundantly_RB in_IN Malda_NNP ._.

397_CD There_EX is_VBZ no_DT likelihood_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN charas_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG illicitly_RB used_VBN ._.

36_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP so_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP attribute_VBP the_DT fact_NN to_TO the_DT growing_VBG fashion_NN among_IN the_DT English_NNP educated_VBD classes_NNS of_IN indulgence_NN in_IN alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS ._.

39_CD ._.

40_CD ._.

Ganja.423_NNP Thus_NNP ,_, after_IN manuring_VBG and_CC by_IN repeated_VBN ploughing_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT land_NN is_VBZ sufficiently_RB pulverised_VBN and_CC be-_JJ comes_VBZ fit_NN for_IN receiving_VBG the_DT seedlings_NNS ,_, ridges_NNS are_VBP made_VBN all_DT over_IN the_DT field_NN at_IN equal_JJ distances_NNS of_IN one_CD cubit_NN each_DT ._.
The_DT seeds_NNS are_VBP first_JJ sown_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN Bhadra_NNP in_IN a_DT separate_JJ field_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PRP think_VBP may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT nursery_NN ._.

Transplantation_NN is_VBZ never_RB delayed_VBN beyond_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN September_NNP ._.
Here_RB it_PRP would_MD be_VB worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN that_IN the_DT ridge-making_NN and_CC the_DT transplant-_JJ ation_NN of_IN the_DT seedlings_NNS should_MD be_VB completed_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, otherwise_RB the_DT soil_NN so_RB well_RB pulverised_VBN would_MD scarcely_RB retain_VB any_DT moisture_NN to_TO receive_VB the_DT young_JJ plants_NNS ._.
The_DT seed_NN beds_VBZ or_CC nurseries_NNS mentioned_VBN above_IN are_VBP never_RB manured_VBN and_CC the_DT ground_NN is_VBZ never_RB covered_VBN ,_, as_IN is_VBZ generally_RB done_VBN with_IN the_DT plantation_NN of_IN cab-_JJ bages_NNS ,_, nor_CC is_VBZ the_DT field_NN irrigated_VBD ._.

The_DT seeds_NNS take_VBP about_IN a_DT week_NN 's_POS time_NN to_TO sprout_VB forth_NN ._.
If_IN heavy_JJ downpours_NNS set_VBN in_IN after_IN sowing_VBG the_DT seeds_NNS in_IN the_DT nursery_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT transplanta-_JJ tion_NN of_IN seedlings_NNS into_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, a_DT second_JJ sowing_NN or_CC plantation_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, becomes_VBZ necessary_JJ ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN Agrahyan_NNP or_CC earlier_JJR ,_, accord-_JJ ing_NN to_TO the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crop_NN ,_, the_DT cultivators_NNS em-_JJ ploy_NN ganja_NN doctors_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP locally_RB known_VBN as_IN poddars_NNS or_CC parakdars_NNS to_TO inspect_VB the_DT ganja_NN field_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT they_PRP continue_VBP to_TO do_VB till_VB the_DT middle_NN of_IN Pous_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO destroy_VB the_DT male_NN plants_NNS before_IN in-_JJ florescence_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP make_VBP the_DT female_NN plants_NNS ,_, which_WDT yield_VBP ganja_NN ,_, run_VB into_IN seed_NN ._.
The_DT operation_NN of_IN trimming_NN is_VBZ renewed_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
When_WRB the_DT fields_NNS wear_VBP a_DT dry_JJ look_NN ,_, cultivators_NNS begin_VBP to_TO water_NN them_PRP ._.
The_DT culti-_JJ vators_NNS evince_RB great_JJ care_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT soil_NN moist_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ generally_RB sandy_JJ loam_NN ._.
In_IN January_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT plants_NNS attain_VBP sufficient_JJ maturity_NN ,_, the_DT cultiva-_JJ tors_NNS cut_VBD and_CC remove_VB the_DT crop_NN from_IN the_DT field_NN to_TO the_DT place_NN of_IN manufacture_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ done_VBN generally_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN ._.
The_DT stalks_NNS are_VBP then_RB spread_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC suffered_VBD to_TO lie_VB there_RB till_VB it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB midday_JJ ,_, when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP properly_RB covered_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT even-_JJ ing_NN comes_VBZ on_IN ,_, the_DT coverings_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN and_CC they_PRP are_VBP left_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT dew_NN ._.
So_IN the_DT stalks_NNS remain_VBP till_IN the_DT noon_NN of_IN the_DT following_JJ day_NN ._.
Now_RB comes_VBZ the_DT threshing_NN of_IN the_DT flowering_NN tops_NNS ._.
A_DT mat_NN is_VBZ spread_VBN on_IN a_DT very_RB plain_JJ ground_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT the_DT stalks_NNS are_VBP all_DT marshalled_VBN in_IN a_DT circular_JJ form_NN called_VBN chakal_NN ,_, the_DT tops_NNS all_DT pointing_VBG to_TO the_DT centre_NN ._.
A_DT mat_NN is_VBZ then_RB spread_VBN over_IN the_DT file_NN ,_, and_CC four_CD or_CC five_CD persons_NNS ascend_NN and_CC begin_VB to_TO trample_VB upon_IN them_PRP ._.
Pressing_VBG in_IN this_DT way_NN goes_VBZ on_IN for_IN about_IN five_CD minutes_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT men_NNS get_VBP down_RB and_CC ,_, holding_VBG in_IN each_DT hand_NN a_DT stalk_NN ,_, begin_VB to_TO beat_VB them_PRP against_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO remove_VB the_DT seeds_NNS from_IN the_DT tops_NNS ._.
This_DT process_NN of_IN marshalling_NN and_CC trampling_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN twice_RB more_RBR ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT second_JJ occa-_JJ sion_NN each_DT twig_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN and_CC pressed_VBN under_IN foot_NN separately_RB ._.
The_DT cultivators_NNS then_RB dry_VBP the_DT stalks_NNS after_IN covering_VBG the_DT top_NN for_IN a_DT short_JJ while_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT ganja_NN becomes_VBZ ready_JJ for_IN market_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT process_NN of_IN making_VBG flat_JJ ganja_NN ._.
The_DT process_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT round_NN ganja_NN is_VBZ near-_JJ ly_IN the_DT same_JJ in_IN the_DT main_JJ ._.
The_DT difference_NN ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, lies_VBZ in_IN this_DT ,_, that_IN ,_, instead_RB of_IN trampling_VBG with_IN foot_NN ,_, the_DT twigs_NNS are_VBP rolled_VBN ._.
I_PRP must_MD here_RB note_VB that_IN for_IN the_DT first_JJ and_CC second_JJ time_NN the_DT twigs_NNS are_VBP rolled_VBN with_IN foot_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP take_VBP a_DT roundish_JJ shape_NN they_PRP are_VBP for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN rolled_VBN with_IN hands_NNS to_TO make_VB them_PRP perfectly_RB round_VBP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN both_DT round_NN and_CC flat_JJ ganja_NN the_DT process_NN of_IN trampling_VBG or_CC rolling_VBG is_VBZ repeated_VBN thrice_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT interval_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT the_DT twigs_NNS are_VBP alternately_RB dried_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT dew_NN ._.
The_DT flower_NN tops_NNS of_IN ganja_NN detached_VBN from_IN the_DT twigs_NNS ,_, whether_IN of_IN flat_JJ or_CC of_IN round_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT detachment_NN is_VBZ accidental_JJ or_CC deliberate_NN ,_, are_VBP called_VBN chur_NN ._.

I_PRP admit_VBP that_IN moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_JJ gives_VBZ staying_VBG power_NN under_IN severe_JJ exertion_NN and_CC exposure_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO alleviate_VB fatigue_NN ;_: but_CC these_DT effects_NNS last_JJ for_IN some_DT time_NN after_IN the_DT smoking_NN ._.

233_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN BABU_NNP AKSHAY_NNP KUMAR_NNP MAITRA_NNP ,_, *_NNP Secretary_NNP ,_, Rajshahi_NNP Association_NNP ,_, Pleader_NNP ,_, Judge_NNP 's_POS Court_NNP ,_, Member_NNP ,_, Rajshahi_NNP District_NNP Board_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP ,_, Rampur_NNP Boalia_NNP Municipality_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
As_IN an_DT inhabitant_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC a_DT resident_NN of_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP had_VBD some_DT opportunities_NNS of_IN observ-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT consumption_NN and_CC effects_NNS of_IN the_DT various_JJ hemp_NN drugs_NNS used_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ coun-_JJ try_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT pleader_NN practising_NN in_IN the_DT District_NNP of_IN Rajshahi_NNP since_IN August_NNP 1885_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN occasion_NN to_TO attend_VB the_DT Civil_NNP and_CC Criminal_NNP Courts_NNS at_IN Nao-_NNP gaon_NN ,_, the_DT head-quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT ganja_NN mahal_NN ,_, which_WDT gave_VBD me_PRP some_DT opportunities_NNS of_IN observing_VBG the_DT culti-_JJ vation_NN and_CC manufacture_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Rajshahi_NNP Association_NNP and_CC a_DT Member_NNP of_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP District_NNP Board_NNP Sub-Committee_NNP appointed_VBD to_TO consider_VB the_DT questions_NNS circulated_VBN by_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Hemp_NNP Drugs_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP had_VBD some_DT occa-_JJ sions_NNS to_TO make_VB certain_JJ enquiries_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT sale_NN ,_, consumption_NN ,_, and_CC effects_NNS of_IN the_DT various_JJ hemp_NN drugs_NNS in_IN use_NN in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
My_PRP$ answers_NNS are_VBP based_VBN chiefly_JJ upon_IN such_JJ enquiries_NNS and_CC personal_JJ observa-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
From_IN personal_JJ observations_NNS and_CC enquiries_NNS made_VBN by_IN me_PRP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, I_PRP find_VBP that_IN the_DT definitions_NNS given_VBN in_IN this_DT question_NN may_MD safely_RB be_VB accepted_VBN for_IN the_DT province_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN no_DT scientific_JJ difference_NN between_IN a_DT bhang_NN and_CC a_DT ganja_NN plant_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ difference_NN consists_VBZ in_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN while_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN from_IN male_NN and_CC female_JJ wild_JJ plants_NNS growing_VBG spontaneously_RB in_IN al-_JJ most_JJS all_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, ganja_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN only_RB from_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ female_NN plants_NNS ,_, the_DT males_NNS having_VBG been_VBN carefully_RB destroyed_VBN at_IN an_DT early_JJ stage_NN of_IN their_PRP$ growth_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT ganja_NN sold_VBD all_DT over_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP always_RB noticed_VBN the_DT presence_NN of_IN ripe_JJ fruits_NNS or_CC seeds_NNS ,_, which_WDT show_VBP that_IN however_RB carefully_RB the_DT males_NNS may_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS ,_, they_PRP can_MD not_RB entirely_RB put_VB a_DT stop_NN to_TO fertilisation_NN ._.
This_DT may_MD be_VB due_JJ to_TO several_JJ causes_NNS ._.
It_PRP may_MD give_VB rise_NN to_TO the_DT natural_JJ and_CC à_JJ priori_NN assumption_NN that_IN all_DT males_NNS are_VBP not_RB success-_JJ fully_RB destroyed_VBN ,_, or_CC admitting_VBG that_IN they_PRP are_VBP so_RB destroyed_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT abnormal_JJ male_NN flowers_NNS on_IN female_JJ plants_NNS cause_VBP this_DT fertilisation_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT dried_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS of_IN carefully_RB cultivated_VBN female_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS (_( Cannabis_NNP indica_NN )_) ,_, which_WDT have_VBP become_VBN coated_VBN with_IN resin_NN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN having_VBG been_VBN unable_JJ to_TO set_VB seeds_NNS freely_RB ._.
This_DT object_NN is_VBZ secured_VBN by_IN retarding_VBG the_DT course_NN of_IN free_JJ fertilisation_NN by_IN weeding_VBG out_RP the_DT males_NNS ._.
Ganja_NNP may_MD be_VB classified_VBN thus:493_IN These_DT seeds_NNS ,_, once_RB thickly_RB scattered_VBN over_IN the_DT soil_NN ,_, give_VB rise_NN to_TO a_DT dense_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN in_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT extensive_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT female_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN a_DT special_JJ tract_NN of_IN land_NN about_IN 16_CD square_JJ miles_NNS in_IN area_NN comprising_NN parts_NNS of_IN thanna_NN Naogaon_NNP in_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, of_IN Adamdighi_NNP and_CC Nawabgunge_NNP in_IN Bogra_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN Mahadebpore_NNP in_IN Dinajpur_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN charas_NNS or_CC bhang_NN in_IN Lower_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, obtained_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB small_JJ quantity_NN from_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN Rajshahi_NNP ._.
The_DT plant_NN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ,_, is_VBZ nowhere_RB culti-_JJ vated_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN its_PRP$ fibre_NN or_CC seeds_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT seeds_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT ganja_NN cultivation_NN are_VBP utilised_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
A_DT variety_NN of_IN hemp_NN ,_, locally_RB called_VBD sone-pát_NN ,_, is_VBZ cultivated_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN for_IN fibre_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT variety_NN is_VBZ not_RB known_VBN to_TO contain_VB cannabine_NN or_CC any_DT active_JJ narcotic_JJ principle_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN some_DT slight_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT area_NN under_IN ganja_JJ cultivation_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT area_NN under_IN actual_JJ cultivation_NN varies_NNS from_IN year_NN to_TO year_NN ,_, partly_RB on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN ganja_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB suc-_JJ cessfully_RB grown_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ field_NN year_NN after_IN year_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS take_VBP to_TO the_DT ganja_NN cultivation_NN according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ experience_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ preceding_NN year_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
While_IN siddhi_NN is_VBZ obtained_VBN indifferently_RB from_IN hemp_NN ,_, whether_IN cultivated_VBN or_CC wild_JJ ,_, and_CC whether_IN male_NN or_CC female_NN ,_, ganja_NN is_VBZ obtained_VBN solely_RB from_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ female_NN plants_NNS ._.
The_DT land_NN on_IN which_WDT ganja_NN is_VBZ grown_VBN in_IN Rajshahi_NNP is_VBZ locally_RB called_VBN the_DT ganja_NN mahal_NN ._.
The_DT entire_JJ tract_NN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN near_IN about_IN its_PRP$ head-quarters_NNS at_IN Naogaon_NNP ,_, is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT direct_JJ rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, not_RB in_IN anyway_RB shaded_VBN by_IN any_DT trees_NNS ._.
The_DT land_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB ploughed_VBN with_IN more_JJR than_IN ordinary_JJ care_NN ._.
The_DT ploughing_NN begins_VBZ in_IN Bysak_NNP and_CC goes_VBZ on_IN all_DT through_IN the_DT rains_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, and_CC cowdung_NN ,_, leaf_JJ manure_NN and_CC earth_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT beds_NNS of_IN ditches_NNS are_VBP added_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN till_VB the_DT field_NN becomes_VBZ ready_JJ for_IN plan-_JJ tation_NN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT weather_NN clears_VBZ up_RP in_IN September_NNP the_DT seedlings_NNS ,_, about_IN half_PDT a_DT cubit_NN high_JJ ,_, are_VBP transplanted_VBN at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
When_WRB they_PRP grow_VBP to_TO a_DT certain_JJ height_NN ,_, the_DT tops_NNS of_IN male_NN plants_NNS are_VBP broken_VBN down_RP by_IN experts_NNS ,_, showing_VBG what_WP plants_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
The_DT females_NNS alone_RB are_VBP thus_RB left_VBN to_TO flower_VB ,_, and_CC these_DT yield_VBP the_DT ganja_NN ,_, which_WDT consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT dried_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT cultivators_NNS of_IN ganja_NNS do_VBP not_RB form_VB a_DT special_JJ class_NN ._.
Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadans_NNPS of_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ cultivating_NN classes_NNS cultivate_VBP ganja_NN with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN special_JJ experts_NNS ,_, who_WP again_RB do_VBP not_RB belong_VB to_TO any_DT special_JJ class_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP no_DT information_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN ._.

Whether_IN the_DT seeds_NNS of_IN wild_JJ hemp_NNS which_WDT produces_VBZ bhang_NN may_MD be_VB utilised_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN has_VBZ yet_RB to_TO be_VB ascertained_VBN ._.
The_DT people_NNS here_RB do_VBP not_RB know_VB that_IN bhang_NN and_CC ganja_NN are_VBP the_DT different_JJ pro-_JJ ducts_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ plant_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ restricted_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP to_TO parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP ,_, Bogra_NNP ,_, and_CC Dinajpur_NNP districts_NNS ,_, the_DT whole_JJ tract_NN being_VBG locally_RB known_VBN as_IN the_DT ganja_NN mahal_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO say_VB why_WRB these_DT tracts_NNS were_VBD specially_RB selected_VBN ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP ganja_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT mul-_JJ berry_NN plants_NNS ,_, requires_VBZ a_DT raised_VBN ground_NN with_IN fine_JJ sandy_JJ soil_NN ,_, rich_JJ with_IN leaf_JJ manure_NN and_CC unshaded_VBN by_IN trees_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ perhaps_RB this_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ tract_NN which_WDT first_RB drew_VBD the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT pioneers_NNS of_IN ganja_JJ cultivation_NN in_IN Rajsbahi_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN the_DT ganja_NN mahals_NNS of_IN Rajshahi_NNP at_IN Naogaon_NNP ,_, where_WRB a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN charas_NN is_VBZ also_RB obtained_VBN by_IN collecting_VBG the_DT scrapings_NNS from_IN the_DT feet_NNS of_IN the_DT labourers_NNS who_WP tread_VBP down_RP the_DT ganja_NN during_IN its_PRP$ manufacture_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP told_VBD that_IN seven_CD to_TO eight_CD thousand_VB maunds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP pre-_JJ pared_VBN annually_RB in_IN Rajshahi_NNP ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ not_RB pre-_JJ pared_VBN in_IN Lower_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.
It_PRP grows_VBZ wild_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS collect_VBP some_DT leaves_NNS ,_, dry_VB them_PRP and_CC preserve_VB them_PRP for_IN use_NN ._.
Some_DT people_NNS ,_, after_IN collecting_VBG these_DT green_JJ leaves_NNS ,_, boil_VBP them_PRP in_IN milk_NN and_CC then_RB dry_JJ and_CC preserve_VB them_PRP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO confer_VB greater_JJR medicinal_JJ properties_NNS to_TO the_DT drug_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ generally_RB prepared_JJ ,_, or_CC rather_RB col-_JJ lected_VBN ,_, by_IN the_DT people_NNS from_IN the_DT wild_JJ plants_NNS ._.
Some_DT people_NNS regularly_RB collect_VBP these_DT leaves_NNS on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Bengali_NNP year_NN ,_, the_DT Choitra_NNP Sankranti_NNP day_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO contain_VB the_DT greatest_JJS beneficial_JJ properties_NNS ._.
It_PRP can_MD be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN wherever_WDT grown_VBN ;_: but_CC the_DT people_NNS generally_RB prefer_VBP to_TO use_VB the_DT bhang_NN grown_VBN in_IN Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, Patna_NNP ,_, and_CC Benares_NNP ._.
Ganja_NNP can_MD not_RB ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT plants_NNS of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ hemp_NN the_DT narcotic_JJ principle_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO reside_VB in_IN the_DT plants_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT males_NNS are_VBP carefully_RB destroyed_VBN and_CC the_DT females_NNS alone_RB are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO run_VB to_TO flower_VB ,_, this_DT narcotic_JJ substance_NN collects_NNS itself_PRP in_IN and_CC around_IN the_DT flower-_JJ ing_NN tops_NNS which_WDT produce_VBP ganja_NN ._.
As_IN no_DT steps_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN to_TO arrest_VB free_JJ fertilisation_NN in_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN ,_, its_PRP$ narcotic_JJ substance_NN does_VBZ not_RB reside_VB in_IN the_DT flower-_JJ ing_NN tops_NNS ,_, but_CC is_VBZ distributed_VBN over_IN the_DT leaves_NNS ._.
Hence_NNP no_DT ganja_NN can_MD be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ seen_VBN to_TO be_VB cultivated_VBN by_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ people_NNS ,_, and_CC bhang_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN and_CC preserved_VBN by_IN any_DT one_NN who_WP has_VBZ any_DT need_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
17_CD ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB know_VB anything_NN about_IN charas_NNS ,_, but_CC ganja_NN and_CC bhang_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO lose_VB their_PRP$ intoxicating_NN properties_NNS by_IN keeping_VBG them_PRP exposed_VBN ._.
Smokers_NNS of_IN ganja_NN would_MD not_RB touch_VB ganja_NN over_IN a_DT year_NN old_JJ ;_: but_CC old_JJ bhang_NN has_VBZ some_DT demand_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO possess_VB more_RBR medicinal_JJ properties_NNS than_IN the_DT fresh_JJ leaves_NNS ._.

31_CD ._.

But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT prevailing_NN use_NN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP of_IN bhang_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Durga_NNP Puja_NNP ,_, when_WRB some_DT Hindus_NNP do_VBP take_VB a_DT moderate_JJ quantity_NN of_IN bhang_NN ._.
This_DT custom_NN is_VBZ old_JJ and_CC has_VBZ not_RB wholly_RB died_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ no_DT religious_JJ sanction_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ certainly_RB no_RB binding_VBG force_NN on_IN the_DT conscience_NN of_IN any_DT Hindu_NNP ._.
After_IN the_DT immersion_NN of_IN the_DT idols_NNS in_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT Bijaya_NNP day_NN ,_, people_NNS go_VBP to_TO visit_VB their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC return_VB many_JJ cordial_JJ greetings_NNS of_IN the_DT day_NN ._.
On_IN such_JJ occasions_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ to_TO entertain_VB the_DT visitors_NNS with_IN sweetmeats_NNS ,_, sherbet_NN and_CC betel_NN leaves_NNS ._.

This_DT custom_NN is_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT least_JJS degree_JJ likely_RB to_TO lead_VB to_TO the_DT formation_NN of_IN any_DT habit_NN ._.
33_CD ._.
The_DT consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN evil_JJ habits_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT consumer_NN is_VBZ looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN a_DT low-bred_JJ individual_NN ._.

34_CD ._.

35_CD ._.

There_EX are_VBP questions_NNS of_IN sectarian_JJ importance_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB taken_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT opposite_JJ sects_NNS as_IN a_DT matter_NN involving_VBG a_DT principle_NN of_IN Law_NNP applicable_JJ to_TO all_DT ._.

36_CD ._.
That_DT alcohol_NN has_VBZ now-a-days_NNS displaced_VBN ganja_NNS and_CC charas_NNS to_TO some_DT extent_NN and_CC bhang_NN to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN ,_, is_VBZ mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT change_NN of_IN habits_NNS of_IN life_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS with_IN the_DT change_NN of_IN times_NNS ._.
Even_RB an_DT illiterate_JJ man_NN of_IN these_DT days_NNS tries_NNS and_CC aspires_NNS to_TO copy_VB his_PRP$ superiors_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT example_NN of_IN the_DT higher_JJR class_NN is_VBZ thus_RB gradually_RB penetrating_VBG the_DT lower_JJR strata_NN of_IN society_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ a_DT disreputable_JJ drug_NN ;_: its_PRP$ use_NN in_IN this_DT country_NN has_VBZ always_RB been_VBN associated_VBN with_IN crimes_NNS and_CC misdemeanors_NNS ;_: indulgence_NN in_IN this_DT drug_NN is_VBZ generally_RB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT low_JJ habit_NN ._.
Against_IN all_PDT these_DT stands_VBZ its_PRP$ extreme_JJ cheapness_NN as_IN the_DT only_JJ recommendation_NN of_IN ganja_NN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ people_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ poverty_JJ which_WDT binds_VBZ them_PRP down_RP to_TO ganja_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT moment_NN a_DT man_NN of_IN dissipated_JJ habit_NN earns_VBZ enough_JJ to_TO pay_VB for_IN an_DT alcoholic_JJ drink_NN ,_, he_PRP eagerly_RB begins_VBZ to_TO copy_VB his_PRP$ superiors_NNS ._.

The_DT cheap_JJ liquor_NN of_IN the_DT outstill_NN having_VBG supplied_VBN one_CD of_IN these_DT conditions_NNS ,_, ganja_NN begins_VBZ to_TO decline_VB in_IN a_DT perceptible_JJ degree_NN It_PRP was_VBD not_RB uncommon_JJ to_TO find_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN still_RB lingering_VBG among_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT middle_JJ classes_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT price_NN of_IN alcoholic_JJ drinks_NNS was_VBD high_JJ ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN cheap_JJ liquor_NN ,_, ganja_NN has_VBZ wholly_RB been_VBN discarded_VBN by_IN the_DT middle_JJ class_NN ._.

Chapter_NN VI_NNP ._.
Note.498_NNP Our_PRP$ body_NN is_VBZ composed_VBN of_IN organs_NNS ,_, destined_VBD to_TO accomplish_VB the_DT various_JJ acts_NNS of_IN life_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP scientifically_RB called_VBN functions_NNS ._.
The_DT functions_NNS may_MD properly_RB be_VB divided_VBN into_IN two_CD classes:499_NNS are_VBP however_RB sometimes_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB quite_RB healthy_JJ and_CC well_RB nourished_VBN in_IN body_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN a_DT mendicant_NN who_WP sits_VBZ naked_VBN day_NN and_CC night_NN on_IN a_DT pile_NN of_IN wood_NN floating_NN in_IN the_DT Hughli_NNP near_IN Azimganj_NNP ,_, without_IN anything_NN to_TO cover_VB his_PRP$ head_NN or_CC take_VB shelter_NN from_IN the_DT rain_NN ,_, storm_NN or_CC heat_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ occupied_VBN in_IN smoking_VBG ganja_NN all_DT day_NN and_CC night_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, though_RB old_JJ ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO keep_VB a_DT good_JJ health_NN ._.
But_CC such_JJ peculiar_JJ votaries_NNS have_VBP never_RB been_VBN placed_VBN under_IN regular_JJ observation_NN to_TO justify_VB us_PRP in_IN holding_VBG that_IN ganja_JJ produces_VBZ bene-_JJ ficial_JJ effects_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ votaries_NNS ._.
45_CD ._.
Even_RB a_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ,_, if_IN practised_VBN as_IN a_DT daily_JJ habit_NN ,_, produces_VBZ physi-_JJ cal_JJ ,_, mental_JJ and_CC moral_JJ [_NNP degradation_NN in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
The_DT normal_JJ physical_JJ condition_NN of_IN some_DT votary_NN may_MD be_VB strong_JJ enough_RB to_TO withstand_VB con-_JJ stant_JJ poisoning_NN with_IN these_DT drugs_NNS for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT long_JJ run_NN every_DT constitution_NN is_VBZ sure_JJ to_TO break_VB down_RP under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN these_DT narcotic_JJ drugs_NNS impairs_VBP the_DT constitu-_JJ tion_NN ,_, injures_VBZ digestion_NN ,_, causes_VBZ dysentery_NN and_CC bron-_NN chitis_NN after_IN some_DT years_NNS ._.

The_DT intellect_NN is_VBZ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR affected_VBN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT poisoning_NN goes_VBZ on_IN from_IN day_NN to_TO day_NN the_DT votary_JJ gradually_RB begins_VBZ to_TO live_VB more_JJR and_CC more_RBR in_IN the_DT land_NN of_IN hallu-_JJ cinations_NNS ,_, till_VB the_DT intellect_JJ loses_VBZ its_PRP$ elasticity_NN and_CC produces_VBZ insanity_NN ._.
The_DT physical_JJ effects_NNS of_IN habi-_JJ tual_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_JJ come_JJ very_RB soon_RB to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT neighbours_NNS ._.
A_DT beginner_NN in_IN a_DT family_NN ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB carefully_RB he_PRP may_MD try_VB to_TO conceal_VB his_PRP$ newly-_JJ formed_JJ habits_NNS ,_, is_VBZ sure_JJ to_TO be_VB found_VBN out_RP by_IN his_PRP$ family_NN members_NNS ._.
The_DT mental_JJ derangement_NN produced_VBN by_IN the_DT constant_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN takes_VBZ some_DT time_NN to_TO appear_VB as_IN a_DT permanent_JJ trait_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT long_JJ continued_JJ habit_NN of_IN this_DT nature_NN generally_RB ends_VBZ in_IN insanity_NN and_CC very_RB often_RB in_IN dysentery_NN ,_, bronchitis_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB in_IN complete_JJ loss_NN of_IN voice_NN ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN a_DT ganja-smoker_NN ,_, collected_VBN and_CC kindly_RB placed_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ hands_NNS by_IN Dr._NNP Rogers_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, is_VBZ quoted_VBN verbatim_NN to_TO show_VB how_WRB far_RB the_DT mental_JJ derangements_NNS ,_, once_RB produced_VBN by_IN ganja_NN ,_, last_JJ even_RB when_WRB the_DT votary_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN under_IN restraint_NN and_CC how_WRB far_RB the_DT habit_NN induces_VBZ tendencies_NNS of_IN a_DT criminal_JJ nature_NN ._.

32_CD ._.

35_CD ._.
It_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB feasible_JJ to_TO prohibit_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN any_DT or_CC all_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO cause_VB discontent_NN among_IN the_DT consumers_NNS ,_, but_CC having_VBG regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ limited_JJ number_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT likelihood_NN of_IN a_DT political_JJ danger_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ every_DT chance_NN of_IN the_DT prohibition_NN being_VBG followed_VBN by_IN recourse_NN to_TO alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS ._.
41_CD ._.
For_IN medicinal_JJ purposes_NNS bhang_NN ,_, ganja_NN and_CC charas_NNS possess_RB wholesome_JJ properties_NNS ._.
The_DT classes_NNS of_IN people_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP engaged_VBN in_IN hard_JJ manual_JJ labour_NN or_CC have_VBP to_TO expose_VB themselves_PRP at_IN night_NN by_IN reason_NN of_IN their_PRP$ occupations_NNS ,_, are_VBP generally_RB given_VBN to_TO smok-_JJ ing_NN ganja_NN ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ considerably_RB used_VBN in_IN yunani_NN or_CC hakimi_NN medicines_NNS for_IN aphrodisiacs_NN ._.

That_DT is_VBZ my_PRP$ chief_JJ view_NN in_IN coming_VBG before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB wish_VB for_IN total_JJ prohibition_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB to_TO what_WP point_NN restriction_NN has_VBZ gone_VBN at_IN present_NN ._.
What_WP I_PRP mean_VBP is_VBZ that_IN I_PRP want_VBP to_TO see_VB the_DT drug_NN less_CC used_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS than_IN I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN it_PRP used_VBD in_IN the_DT places_NNS I_PRP know504_VBP short_JJ of_IN prohibition_NN ._.
This_DT could_MD be_VB effected_VBN by_IN making_VBG the_DT drug_NN less_RBR accessible_JJ to_TO the_DT people_NNS ;_: but_CC how_WRB this_DT could_MD be_VB done_VBN is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN I_PRP can_MD say_VB ._.
At_IN present_JJ every_DT one_CD can_MD get_VB ganja_JJ or_CC bhang_NN for_IN a_DT pice_NN or_CC a_DT couple_NN of_IN pice_NN ._.
I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO see_VB the_DT drugs_NNS made_VBN dearer_NN ._.

If_IN it_PRP were_VBD possible_JJ to_TO prohibit_VB ganja_JJ alone_RB ,_, I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO see_VB it_PRP done_VBN ,_, leaving_VBG charas_NNS and_CC bhang_NN to_TO be_VB used_VBN under_IN restriction_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP not_RB sure_JJ that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB possible_JJ ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB know_VB at_IN what_WP price_NN ganja_NN is_VBZ now_RB being_VBG sold_VBN in_IN Bhawanipur_NNP ;_: but_CC I_PRP sent_VBD a_DT pice_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP gave_VBD me_PRP a_DT bit_NN of_IN flat_JJ ganja_NN about_IN the_DT weight_NN of_IN a_DT quarter_NN tola_NN ,_, enough_RB for_IN one_CD chillum_NN ._.

The_DT Association_NNP on_IN whose_WP$ behalf_NN I_PRP appear_VBP has_VBZ connection_NN with_IN Mr._NNP Caine_NNP 's_POS Temperance_NNP Associa-_NNP tion_NN and_CC is_VBZ interested_JJ in_IN ventilating_VBG the_DT grievances_NNS of_IN India_NNP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT political_JJ association_NN ._.

The_DT Society_NNP 's_POS head-_JJ quarters_NNS are_VBP in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ branches_NNS in_IN almost_RB all_DT districts_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
The_DT views_NNS con-_NN tained_VBN in_IN the_DT printed_JJ paper_NN are_VBP the_DT views_NNS of_IN the_DT Association_NNP ._.
A_DT special_JJ meeting_NN was_VBD held_VBN in_IN Cal-_NNP cutta_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT reports_NNS from_IN the_DT various_JJ branches_NNS were_VBD considered_VBN and_CC the_DT conclusions_NNS framed_VBD ._.
A_DT draft_NN was_VBD circulated_VBN to_TO every_DT member_NN in_IN the_DT mufas-_JJ sal_NN and_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT printed_JJ paper_NN is_VBZ the_DT final_JJ draft_NN as_IN approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Association_NNP ._.
A_DT second_JJ sentence_NN of_IN the_DT paragraph_NN relating_VBG to_TO religious_JJ sanction_NN refers_NNS to_TO the_DT emphatic_JJ terms_NNS which_WDT were_VBD used_VBN by_IN the_DT late_JJ Viceroy_NNP in_IN passing_VBG the_DT Age_NNP of_IN Consent_NNP Bill_NNP ._.
The_DT Association_NNP wish_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN Kali_NNP Das_NNP ,_, Gupta_NNP ,_, Kabiraj_NNP ,_, to_TO be_VB transferred_VBN from_IN Appendix_NNP I_PRP (_( 2_CD )_) to_TO Appendix_NNP I_PRP (_( 1_CD )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT names_NNS of_IN Gopi_NNP Mohun_NNP Roy_NNP ,_, Benod_NNP Lall_NNP Sen_NNP ,_, and_CC Upendra_NNP Nath_NNP Sen_NNP erased_VBD from_IN Appendix_NNP I_PRP (_( 2_CD )_) ._.

The_DT views_NNS of_IN the_DT Association_NNP are_VBP to_TO suppress_VB ganja_NN ,_, charas_NNS ,_, bhang_NN and_CC majum_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO prohibit_VB the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ._.
The_DT Association_NNP has_VBZ considered_VBN the_DT extensive_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN by_IN devotees_NNS and_CC fakirs_NNS ,_, and_CC sees_VBZ no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN depriving_VBG them_PRP of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
We_PRP are_VBP aware_JJ of_IN the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ used_VBN by_IN such_JJ persons_NNS all_DT over_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP will_MD have_VB no_DT real_JJ grievance_NN if_IN the_DT supply_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN off_RP ._.

This_DT difficulty_NN arises_VBZ from_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ wild_NNS ._.

We_PRP have_VBP considered_VBN whether_IN the_DT suppression_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC other_JJ hemp_NN drugs_NNS might_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN alcoholic_JJ liquors_NNS ;_: and_CC we_PRP think_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ danger_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, because_IN (_( 1_CD )_) all_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC Mahomedans_NNPS are_VBP by_IN their_PRP$ religion-_JJ forbidden_NN to_TO take_VB wine_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) wine_NN is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR costly_JJ than_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) the_DT raising_NN of_IN the_DT duty_NN on_IN ganja_NN has_VBZ resulted_VBN in_IN a_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN without_IN any_DT corre-_JJ sponding_NN increase_NN in_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN liquor_NN ._.
